name: Mini Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Heat Protectant Leave In Conditioner Primer
about: What it is: A primer that starts your styling routine by instantly cutting frizz by 50 percent all day versus untreated hair (even in extreme humidity)...Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, and Curly..Hair Concerns:- Frizz.- UV Protection - Heat Protection..Highlighted Ingredients:- Signature 6-Oil Blend: Provides conditioning, moisture, nourishment, softening, and smoothing..- UV Filters: Protects from the drying effects of the sun...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, phthalates, mineral oil, and sulfates SLS & SLES. It is also cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Meet Bumble and bumble’s number-one bestseller. This multitasking leave-in provides heat protection up to 450°F/232°C, has UV filters to protect hair against the drying effects of the sun, protects color from fading for up to 16 washes, detangles to protect against breakage, smooths, softens, and adds shine...Fragrance Description: This is a luxe yet light scent of fruit and tropical florals, anchored with rich musk and woodsy notes...Clinical Results: In a frizz study, Hairdresser’s Invisible Oil Heat & UV Protective Primer was found to provide:.- 55% reduction in frizz instantly.- 51% reduction in frizz at the 8-hour time point.- Provides frizz reduction even in extreme humidity..In a consumer study on 180 women after one use of Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Heat & UV Protective Primer:.- 98% say hair feels hydrated.- 96% say hair looks healthier.- 95% say hair's easier to style...This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.
ingredients: -Signature 6-Oil Blend: Provides conditioning, moisture, nourishment, softening, and smoothing. .-UV Filters: Protects from the drying effects of the sun. ..Water\Aqua\Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, PEG-12 Glyceryl Dimyristate, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Gardenia Taitensis Flower Extract, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hydrolyzed Corn Starch, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Distearyldimonium Chloride, Dimethiconol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, BHT, Fragrance (Parfum), Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Limonene, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol. The Signature 6-Oil Blend Includes: Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel (Argan) Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Macadamia Integrifolia Seed (Macadamia) Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, and Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil...Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-On day one, apply to damp hair, rake through, and style. .-On day two (and so on), apply to dry hair to refresh and restyle...Pro tips:.-Mist from mid-lengths to ends, working through your hair by squeezing it in. Air-dry for natural styles or blow-dry with a round or flat brush for smooth, straight styles. .-Some areas of the hair may be more (or less) porous than others. Take some time massaging into hair after spraying to help absorb evenly..-When detangling, try using a wide tooth comb. It’s a great way to help prevent breakage.

It does not have any hold so you have to use a gel or mousse if you want the curls to stay. I also used it one day to style my hair with a curling iron, and it really did keep the hair softer and more sleek than without using it. I don’t love the smell but it’s not bothersome. It didn’t do much for my frizz but again, a styler with hold will do better for that. Overall I think it’s a good choice for if you use heat to dry or style your hair.

I also used it in my daughters curly hair and it seemed to work better for her. It smells really good, like coconut but really sweet. It doesn’t serve a purpose for me personally but if you used heat on your hair often I can see it being a staple product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can't say enough about the Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Primer—it's truly a game-changer in my hair care routine! From the very first use, I noticed a remarkable difference in my hair's texture and manageability. Not only did it instantly deliver an incredible 86% boost in hydration, but it also worked wonders in taming frizz, even in the most humid conditions. One of the standout features of this product is its versatility. Not only does it protect my hair from the high heat of styling tools, but it also shields it from the sun's drying effects, making it perfect for year-round use. And let's talk about the fragrance—it's absolutely divine and leaves my hair smelling fresh all day long. What really sets this primer apart is its ability to cater to different hair types and conditions. Whether you have fine, medium, or thick hair, curly or straight, it seems to adapt effortlessly, providing the right level of hydration and smoothing without ever feeling heavy or greasy. I also appreciate that it helps preserve my hair color, keeping it vibrant for up to 16 washes. And the fact that it detangles my hair, reducing breakage, is an added bonus. I love how easy it is to incorporate into my daily routine, whether on damp hair for styling or on dry hair for a quick refresh. In short, the Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Primer is a true multitasker that not only lives up to its claims but surpasses them. If you want soft, smooth, and beautifully hydrated hair with less frizz, this product is an absolute must-have!

reviews.review_text: I was gifted the Hair oil primer by Bumble and Bumble. I love using it for detangling my wavy hair and as a leave in conditioner. the application is super easy with the sprayer giving even distribution and it’s light enough that it doesn’t leave my hair feeling greasy

reviews.review_title: Great new addition to my haircare!

reviews.review_text: I've been looking for a new heat protectant that doesn't make my hair feel oily or greasy after applying it. This oil feels really light on my hair and leaves a healthy feeling finish while giving me a nice shine. I'm so glad I found this hair oil!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of that best primers I have used. I usually have to wait for it to dry though about like a minute or so before I can use this to straighten my hair. Or if you are blow drying you can use it directly and dry it! Absolutely love the fact it makes my hair feel thick and voluminous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this hair oil primer! It’s really is an all in one product. This literally cuts my frizz in half right off the bat and delivers such a nice hydrated look and feel to my hair. One of my favorite things about it is that it also has heat protectant in it so I no longer have to use 5 different products to keep my hair healthy, shiny and protected!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this product as a heat primer because it did make my hair much less frizzy and easier to straighten. I loved it as a detangler as well because even if I let my hair airdry with it applied it didn’t feel with a sticky weird texture. It also smells nice yet subtle. Spray mist is nice too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was received for free in exchange for my honest review. I feel so grateful to get to review this product! I have always wanted to try it. First off, it smells amazing. Second, it does an excellent job!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I heard amazing things about this primer and it lived up to the hype. My hair feels so moisturized and it protects my hair from heat. The bottle mists evenly and the product doesn’t feel heavy or greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this hair primer! My hair feels so moisturized after using it and way less frizzy throughout the day too. I like that it helps protect my hair from heat as well. It doesn’t feel heavy or make my hair oily either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, I can't express how much I've needed a product like this my entire life! This generously sized bottle is a game-changer, and the spray mechanism sets it apart from any other treatment I've ever tried. Unlike most products, it mists evenly, eliminating the need to spray it on your hands first. You can effortlessly apply it all over your hair! I have seriously damaged platinum hair, and I swear by this. I use it after I towel dry my hair post-shower, and it works wonders – detangling and softening super well. Plus, I've noticed a significant reduction in flyaways after using it! A heartfelt thank you for creating this gem – my bleached hair is eternally grateful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This hair primer makes my hair feel so soft! My hair has been extremely dry and brittle lately, but since using this primer it’s been looking less frizzy and feeling more hydrated and healthy. I love knowing that my hair is protected when I use my hairdryer or hot tools. I also love to use it as a next day hair refresher to add some more life and softness into my hair. My hair is fine and it doesn’t weigh it down at all.  It’s definitely making my hair look and feel so much better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This hair oil is incredible. It’s more of a serum consistency, which was a pleasant surprise. Super easy to apply and smells fantastic. I’ve tried it on both freshly washed damp hair and dry hair and it works great both ways. I have naturally curly, frizz-prone hair and live in a humid environment. I’ve definitely noticed a decrease in frizz when straightening my hair and the added shine is a huge bonus. Works great as both a heat protectant and a detangler. A little serum goes a long way, be careful not to over-use it or you’ll get a little greasy looking. 10/10, highly recommend. I received this as a free sample from Sephora Bumble and bumble but would absolutely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using for a few months, it began making my hair sticky/stiff. Not recommended for long thick hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! I’d heard a lot about this product but it exceeded my expectations. The way this makes my hair feel so silky, it makes it so easy to brush through. It looks so much healthier after my blowout I can’t imagine not using this every time I do my hair now.  This was gifted by bumble & bumble in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This hair leave in treatment makes my hair feel so smooth, leaves me having no frizz for days after use, smells amazing and leaves my hair looking shiny! Absolutely love this treatment, and will rebuy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mist is an all-in-one for me! I use it as a detangler and heat protectant, and it makes my hair so smooth and soft and shiny. I have noticed since I started using it that my red hair color doesn't fade as quickly, and my hair feels less dry overall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells amazing! I’ve been using for about two weeks I’ve tried on both damp and dry hair and my hair has never looked better. Has made my once dull hair shiny and smooth! I have less flyaways. And again the sell is amazing def repurchasing when I empty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is an excellent, excellent product if you style your hair, especially with heat toosl! The results are gorgeous if you're blow-drying, straightening, curling/waving, or anything involving heat. I love how soft it makes my hair feel and there's no frizz, even in high humidity weather! That being said, I don't love using this if I'm air drying my hair, or applying it to dry hair. I feel like it gets to be a little bit greasy feeling if I let it air dry and have to wash my hair sooner. That being said, if you can take a few minutes to run a blowdryer over your hair - it's totally worth it! Which makes sense...hence its name :) I love the smell, that it's lightweight, and how shiny my hair looks after styling!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If I can choose one product for my hair to address multiple concerns it will be this one.  My hair is very long and I use hot tools few times a week. With this product not only I protect my hair from the heat, but also  keep it healthy and strong. The oils makes it shiny and soft and my ends look amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i received this product as a free sample. so glad i tried this product because i am always on the lookout for a good leave in conditioner that can detangle my hair easily and leave it feeling smooth. the only con is that it smells too sweet to me, like a baked pastry, whereas i prefer more florals and clean scents. overall this product is amazing, i love how fine the mist is

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this product and it’s been a phenomenal multitasker for me while I’ve been traveling full time. So far the best benefits that I’ve noticed have been the heat protection, the frizz reduction, and the hydration. I do use heat on my hair when drying it initially and also when restyling, and this was a great heat protectant while doing both. My hair wasn’t weighed down and I noticed significant hydration like I would with just a solo leave in conditioner. While in a climate that’s much more humid than my own, the difference between the surface of my hair on the days when I used it and the days that I didn’t were very noticeable. Overall this is a great styling tool and I’m thankful for the full sized bottle because I’m using it daily.

reviews.review_title: Wish I would have purchased sooner

I even like to use it in my daughters hair. I appreciate it has heat protectant and color protectant, as well as helps detangle my long hair.

reviews.review_title: Hydrating but not oily at all
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've short cropped men's-cut hair that I wash twice a day and each time, I blow dry my hair. Contrary to the name, this oil primer isn't oily at all. It goes on smoothly, and absorbs well into the hair. There is definitely some softening going on as well, but it does not weigh down my hair. That's something very important for users who have short hairstyles. I'd recommend that you give this a go if you've similar hairstyling needs as me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I will continue to buy these products as long as my hair allows!!

reviews.review_text: I had fairly high expectations for this product as it's marketed as a primer, protectant, and oil for your hair. While it did protect my hair from heat damage, it left a weird oil film on top and made my hair look oily. It also smells strange. I like that it comes in a spray bottle, but I felt like the nozzle dispensed too little product at a time. Overall, I wasn't that impressed with this product as I have other heat protectants that do the same thing but don't leave my hair looking greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the way this product smells when applying to wet hair, I use it after a shower to detangle prior to blow drying. I will definitely continue using and may have to try on my daughters hair as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary gift from Bumble and Bumble. I received the Bumble & bumble. Hairdresser’s invincible Oil Heat/ UV protectant and fell in love with the product. Additionally, I was also impressed by the built in UV protectant, protecting my hair from drying in the sun and fading hair color. I would recommend this product to any friend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used to use this product for years but once I cut my hair into a bob I didn’t think it was a necessity anymore since I mainly used it for manageability. Now that I have it back I’ll never go a day without it! This spray is so thin and lightweight yet somehow gives me the best hydration out of any hair treatment/oil/serum I’ve ever tried. I have very fine/thin hair and struggle with frizz, this product not only helps with detangling but greatly reduces my frizz! I feel completely safe using this on my color-treated hair, and love the high heat protection. Honestly, this product is the holy-grail hair product that everyone should have. Couldn’t ask for anything more! Highly recommend.

reviews.review_text: I’ve been a long time fan of Bumble and Bumble, their hair care is some of my absolute favorite whether I’m wearing my naturally wavy hair or heat styling, their products are top shelf for me. My hair feels so much more hydrated when I apply this leave-in, as well as it has UV Protection which is a major plus for me living in Florida - UV damage to our hair is a real thing! To top it all off this product is also a heat protectant up to 450 degrees.  I’ve noticed significantly less dehydration and smoother hair follicles when I use this product. I plan to always have it on hand, it’s a hair classic!  I received this product as a free sample. All opinions are my own.

reviews.review_text: I love this hair oil! It leaves my hair feeling so silky soft. It does not weigh down my hair at all and it gives it a nice shine. I also like that I can use it in wet or dry hair. I use it after washing my hair, before blow drying. Then I can also use it in between washes when my hair is feeling dull or dry. It's miracle oil! This product is amazing. I have to admit I was hesitant because it has the word oil in it. But if you just take a small amount and rub it through the ends of your hair when it's still wet it's soaks right in and when you blow dry your hair your hair remain soft but still can hold a curl. It smells good and your hair does not look oily or greasy at all after use. I surprisingly loved it and this product will become part of my regular hair routine. It may seem pricey, but a little bit goes a LONG way! The bottle has lasted me awhile and I'm nowhere near empty (Although I do not use it everyday). It is lightweight, it does not make my hair feel greasy, dirty, or weighed down. It does what it's supposed to! I have very frizzy hair, but this helps sleek it out giving it a nice shine. I also love that it doubles as a heat protectant and UV protectant. It also smells lovely. Although I will not need to for awhile, I will definitely be re-purchasing this product!

reviews.review_title: Game changer after a chemical treatment!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product helped my hair so much after getting a color remover and lighter hair color! My hair is extra long and usually healthy but the color remover made them super dry. I did a lot of things to help: Olaplex, Oribe hair oil, Ouai leave in conditioner on both damp and dry hair, etc. I got this primer at the Rouge sale a few weeks ago and decided to try it on dry hair instead of the Ouai leave in. I couldn't believe the results! My hair was so soft and manageable, and it lasted all day! I did love the Ouai leave in but the results didn't last all day. This primer will definitely replace it in my routine, on both damp and dry hair!

I have thin oily hair normally, but after dry shampooing it becomes.... parched. lol This oil brings it back to life when I need to restyle with heat tools. Like I said, it's not my go-to for freshly washed hair, but staple for after dry shampooing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm half way through the bottle, so I'm comfortable commenting on this product. Pro: It smells nice. But that's about where the benefits end for me. My stylist recommended a pre-heat-styling product, so I bought this. I've noticed no improvement in my hair's texture, strength, shine or manageability. If I use it generously, it makes my hair look limp and greasy. If I use it sparingly, it makes no difference. A department-store leave-in conditioner provides a more noticeable improvement. In fact, when I first started to use the Primer, I noticed some strands of hair looked more damaged than if I'd used no product at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the second bottle of this I've ordered, an absolute must have for me! On my lazy days or when I'm short on time, this is the only leave in treatment I apply, and my hair feel fantastic. I usually apply to damp hair after a shower, and allow to air dry.
Perfect for my fine straight hair! Does not weigh it down at all and controls the frizz while adding shine. This was my first time using it and I love it.

This transformed my hair more than I thought it could (granted this is coming from a goil who used to rarely use heat protectants). My hair feels super soft and looks shinier and healthier after styling. Will repurchase.

reviews.review_title: My go-to hair product for everyday use

Used it today and the curls came out perfect without any frizz. I sprayed it on dry hair, brushed it through and then curled my hair. I used it sparingly. The curls are holding much better with it. We'll see in a couple days if my hair looks greasy due to the oils in this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: (Very, very detailed review). I am on my second bottle and I plan to keep on repurchasing again and again. The full-size bottle lasted me 5 months. Even thought the targeted consumers are people with dry to very dry hair, don’t worry: this product suits every hair type, even wavy, fine, colored and easily-oily hair like me. This spray doesn’t leave the hair looking or feeling greasy.   I love that this product has multiple functions! My favorite way to use it is on its own, when my hair is damp: it detangles, makes it look healthier (the product absorbs more than when used on dry hair) and I don’t need to style it. This product also protects from sun damage (perfect for the summer) and is incredible when used as a heat protectant (before styling with hot tools): my hair is bouncy, more natural and has that « just got back from the hairdresser » subtle shine.  If you’re thinking about it, I definitely recommend that you buy this product! *Pair this with the Hairdresser’s Invisible Oil Soft Textured Finishing Spray for the most gorgeous tousled loose curls!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using this for ~1 year and its prob the best product Ive ever used. I have fine, thin med length highlighted hair that gets damaged and frizzes easily, plus an oil prone scalp. I get it highlighted every 3 months, and have to wash every 2-3 days. So its VERY hard to find hair product that add moisture/protection without being too heavy, sticky or making it greasy. On damp hair (not too dry, not soaking wet either) I spray ~4 pumps in my hand, rub together and work through the mid length through ends, and just a delicate patting of it on the top and front of my hair, then comb through. Too much on the top will prob make it greasy and limp. Ive noticed its UV protection is amazing. My hair color usually gets muddy/oxidizes from too much sun, but this protects it and keeps the blonde bright longer than ever. I usually dont heat style, usually just a quick paddle brush blow dry when its like 80% dry. It seems to be a decent heat protectant for blow drying. I spritz a bit of a different heat protectant just on the ends if i use hot tools.

It protects and conditions all of our different textures ( dry, coarse, or colored hair) This specific leave-in treatment is blended with six featherlight oils, to help soften, silken, tame, defrizz, detangle, and protect against breakage. Plus, it contains UV protection to help shield hair from the drying effects of the sun. Which is super important while we are at the beach!

The smell is so amazing and fresh, it is the perfect blend of ingredients to help soften, and make my hair feel so silky, de-frizzed, and detangled. Not to mention it protects against breakage and UV rays. It’s the perfect, all in one primer. Would absolutely  recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m always wanting to try hair protectants because I style my hair so much. This one is great because it is super lightweight and smells good! My hair feels soft and healthy. It seems a lot of other products make my hair greasy but this one is really light! This will be my go to for awhile.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this invisible oil! It dose not feel a lot oily but it gives shine and controls frizz. The mist is super soft and that way you get an even coating.  I really love using it after shower and any day my hair look a little dull.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect heat protection. This spray is perfect for everyday use to keep your hair safe and healthy. The heat protection in this products helps with hot tools and sun heat as well. The oils help keep the hair feeling soft and fresh. Obsessed with this spray!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have long, thick hair that can become pretty dry after heat styling and continuous sun exposure. This leave in primer helped to keep my hair feeling and looking shiny and silky. The spray design made application super easy.

I received this product in exchange for a review but I love this stuff so much! My hair is damaged and I have been trying to make it healthier. This product is helping restore my curls and my natural wave. I have been using this product for a few days now and I already see improvement!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I hate greasy UV protectors, and this one wasn’t in the slightest! It has a really nice texture, almost like a creamy hyaluronic acid serum, that my hair drank up in seconds. It also left no greasy residue and didn’t weigh my hair down!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have super unmanageable frizz and coarse hair and I’m always looking for the perfect product to tame my hair. I’ve been loving this oil because it also acts as a heat protectant for all the styling i put my hair through.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite hair primer! It softens and strengthens my super dry hair. I spray it after I shower and it detangles my hair so easily. I love that it also protects my hair from the sun which is so perfect for any outdoor activities. It makes my hair look less damaged and shiny.

I love a good leave-in and this is so much more than that! It defrizzes, takes flyaways and is a heat protectant. Also love that it is protecting my hair from UV damage. I love how soft my hair is after use and how easily it seems to style.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product gifted by Bumble and bumble and I love it! It is super lightweight and smells so good! makes my hair soft along with doing a good job protecting it from heat. a lot of other products make my hair greasy but this one is perfectly light!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite heat protectant of all time! It adds slip to your hair without making it feel too overly greasy. This also makes my hair smell so good. I just thing the mist can spray more evenly and finely. Other than that I love this stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying the brand and wow, I am impressed. After shampooing and conditioning my hair ,I spray this all over , focusing on my mid to ends. I like how the most comes out so fine. The next day I woke up with soft detangled hair. Didn't even need to brush

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This primer works very well for my frizzy hair. It helps tame my frizz. It also makes my hair very healthy. I love that my hair looks shiny. My hair also feels very silky and soft. I love the sprayer, it's super easy to mist my hair. I highly recommend this one, especially if you use lots of heat in your hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loveeee this product so much. It smells amazing and does a great job at protecting my hair. I live on an island, so I get a lot of sun and sand and chlorine. This does a great job at protecting my fragile, damaged hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off I love that it’s cruelty free!!! The Bumble and bumble heat & UV protective primer made a big difference when I blowed dried it. It left my hair shiny and it even felt thicker. I would definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product made my hair so smooth and easy to comb out! I love using it after the shower as well as before using any hot tools. The spray nozzle is easy to use and disperses well in my hair. Definitely recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bumble and bumble came out with this hair primer to help protect my hair from heat. I already love and trust this brand so I was very excited to try. I like that it doesn’t leave my hair stiff or give it a burnt smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My hair is very long and thin and naturally straight but tends to be frizzy especially during humid weather. I apply this after I wash my hair while it’s still damp, and my hair air dries smooth but not weighed down or looking greasy. It also helps keep my ends conditioned during heat styling, and my hair looks shiny and healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally got my hands on this after loving it in salons for so long! Such a favorite of mine now…feels light and healthy on my hair and i now that I’m protecting it from the heat when i style! Love it!

reviews.review_title: Adding this to my must-haves list!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this stuff! I have been obsessed since my first use. I have very fine wavy hair, and this primer leaves my hair feeling hydrated without feeling heavy. I also feel like it enhanced my flatiron curls and gave them more structure, but still soft to the touch. My curls even lasted longer. This will be a part of my hair routine from now on!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have very straight , medium thick hair and this works great for me. I use is as a leave in conditioner. I spray it on wet hair and than style it. It has protected my hair against damage. My hair is soft and looks great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This primer is the perfect solution for my frizzy, coarse hair. Especially during the summer, this stuff helps control the frizz and texture so it always looks fresh and smooth! Definitely recommend adding this to you haircare routine!

reviews.review_title: Perfect for heat protection and detangling
reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Lightweight and keeps hair looking gorgeous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

The waves started to come back after like an hour and other sprays let me go a full day. It did leave my hair very soft but just thought I’d mention that as a watch out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have thick wavy hair. I have been looking for an easy to use post product. It helps detangle my hair, reduce frizz, and overall look shiner (especially after I blow dry or straighten it). Loving it so far and it will definitely be part of my hair care routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Invisible oil primer is one of my new favorite additions to my hair care routine with all of the benefits it has. It’s a heat protectant and protects against UV, great for being outdoors and for everyday styling

reviews.review_title: leaves my hair feeling silky smooth and non-frizzy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything Bumble and bumble and this hairdresser's invisible oil primer has been a favorite for so long!  I've repurchased this multiple times because I love it so much! reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this hair product! Works so well with my hair! Keeps my hair from being fried whenever I use heat against my hair and it detangles my hair as well! Makes my hair feel silky soft and smelling amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this leave in oil. I see that it works great for heat protection. I think my hair at more soft and nice to touch. Glad I have tried it! Also I must admit the ingredients are so good! Great summer finding!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I love adding this primer before adding any heat to my hair. My ends get really dry and sometimes my hair is a bit frizzy. This has really helped make the ends feel really smooth. As well a lot less frizz after a blow out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this for my hair ! Feels so light and smells so good i swear its perfect for summer !  I love this brand it never disappoints if you Re looking for a new hair product to try for blow drying this is it !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this brand! The packaging is really nice! The product is like a lotion consistency but sprays on your hair like a light mist which is nice! It definitely protected my hair from the heat. It left my hair soft and shiny!

reviews.review_title: Wish I had picked this up years ago!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I had tried this amazing product long ago! I cannot believe how weightless it actually is! My hair is so thin and fine and I won’t style my hair without this now! I then used it on my daughter’s bleached hair and it brought it back to its smooth, shiny incredibly soft state it was before bleaching. I spray it in my hands and apply from shaft to ends. There is no stickiness or slimy feel. My new secret weapon against all my heat products that gives my hair new life. I’m absolutely in love with this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have really frizzy and dry hair and using this product changed my hair for the better! I was afraid it was going to be too heavy for my thin hair but it's super lightweight! This will definitely be my new heat protectant from now on

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I use it while my hair is wet before drying, before any heat styling, or when I’m going to be outside for longer periods(UV exposure).  It’s also a great alternative to an oil to use as a refresh on your ends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

This leaves my hair soft, helps keep it at bay and helps lessen the damage from heat styling. I definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

Then I used it as a leave-in after washing my hair, and I felt my hair was 3x softer and more behaved than normal after washing. 10/10 would recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

I’m sold, def will get it again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been absolutely loving this as a leave in conditioner post shower! It feels light in my hair, but helps smooth and detangle. I also have been bringing it to the beach with me to keep my hair protected from the UV rays.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

The performance of this formula really shows when you style your hair. You will get the smoothest, silkiest, and shiniest blowout. I’m not great and styling my hair but this product makes it really effortless. I highly recommend this hair primer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: I love this for my hair!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE BUMBLE&BUMBLE! They have multiple lines, but I love their Invisible Oil line. This primer is perfect as just a leave-in conditioner. It is a direct spray with some misting. The longer you let sit, the more moisture (heavier) your hair will be. The scent is very pleasant and mild. There isn't anything distinguishable about it. Hair always looks like the commercials when dried. So soft, shiny, and healthy looking. I have a hard time not touching my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this product is great. It definitely does everything it is supposed to. It makes my hair soft and shiny with getting rid of frizz. I think everyone should try this product at least once in their life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this product transforms my hair from dull and dry to shiny, soft and frizz-free. Another perk, it has UV filters to protect hair against the sun. I use it on damp hair before styling and it works wonders.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've always had historically great experiences with Bumble & Bumble products, so I was very excited to try this primer. While I don't use heat on my hair, I do roll and set it at night, and I spend a lot of time outside - so I was very happy to find a product that helps with UV protection as I color my hair red. What I love about this product is that it's super easy to evenly apply to the hair since it's a spray, and about 4 sprays is plenty to apply to the ends of my long hair when it's wet. The next day, I like spraying about 2 pumps into my hands and running it through the ends for extra hydration and shine. This primer makes my hair noticably less frizzy, and way more shiny and soft, but it also doesn't weigh my hair down (hair is somewhat fine). I think this is a great pick if you are looking to protect your hair from heat/UV, cut frizz, amplify shine, and boost hydration. I also feel like my hair dries faster when I use this. Honestly, it's everything I look for in a product! Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was sent to me by the brand but my opinions are my own- I love how lightweight this is and how good it smells! It doesn’t weigh my hair down or make it greasy. And I love that it has UV protection in it because that’s some thing that I don’t always think about when it comes to my hair! I always think about heat protecting it when I’m styling it but not when I’m out in the sun. Definitely would recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a product I’ve come back to several times (most recently received complimentary by Bumble & Bumble). What I appreciate so much about this product is that it protects my hair, including the Demi-permanent dye I currently have on it, while I’m outside in the hot sun!  Hair is not comprised of living skin cells, so it doesn’t need the traditional UV filters that we put on our skin. Instead, it needs ingredients that will neutralize the impact of the free radicals released in UV rays (this is why you don’t see an SPF rating on this, in case anyone wondered!)  It’s very easy to use and seems to help my hair in looking more shiny and healthy, even with sun exposure. Well done!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is great for fine hair!  I use it as a quick oil on the ends of my dry hair if needed but always on wet hair after the shower for a leave-in conditioner and heat protector in one.  Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

I can’t recommend it highly enough. I love knowing my hair is protected from heat and UV rays - great for color - and I will keep repurchasing forever.

reviews.review_text: I have a lot of hair (thick in number of hairs) but each hair is very fine (thin) and has almost no texture at all. It seemed like it took less time to blow dry and afterward my hair was very silky smooth to the touch. My flyaways on top were minimized to a good degree and my ends felt less dry and smoothed out. The amount of product in the bottle is great too. This will last a long time so it's overall a great value and an effective product.

reviews.review_text: Love this spray. I use it as a leave in conditioner of sorts. Really helps me brush out my fine hair when wet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At this point, I have tried just about every product from Bumble & Bumble’s Hairdresser’s Invisible Oil line and I overall enjoy all of the products. I have pretty thick hair that is color treated and that I occasionally use heat on. My hair has a tendency of getting tangled after a shower so I’m always looking for detanglers and products to help reduce any breakage from combing and provide additional benefits. I think this did a pretty good job when it came to reducing the amount of tangles in my hair and help keep my hair protected over the month I used it. There are other products I prefer for different things (I have a tried and true detangling spray I probably won’t stop using) but I think for a multi-beneficial product, this does a pretty good job.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My hairstylist recommended this the first time I dyed my hair because of its UV protection.. My hair is very tangled when wet and a few sprays of this makes brushing so easy! Smells great, reduces frizz and the bottle lasts a long time! 10/10 will always repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: only used once that's why 4 stars but i have A LOT of breakage so my breakage just frizzes up i used this after my shower last night in damp hair and i have no frizz my hair looks so smooth, i mean as smooth as it's gonna get for how dead my hair is but i think i also used too much because my hair felt as if i didn't wash all my conditioner out but i did i know it's from using to much of this product but it only felt like that after it dried, i just woke up and it kinda fixed itself over night now feels so soft and still no frizz even after sleeping on it. LOVE IT

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Lindsay Silberman sold me on it based on her review. It is so good, protective and humidity resistant. Totally recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: easy to apply, good fragrance. hold the hair pretty well, controls flyaway, hair is not stiff. what else can you ask for!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell and heat protection. One of the best products so far for this brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so pleasantly surprised by this! I’m a longtime fan of B&B, but this is by far my favorite product. My hair is a little on the dry side and 2c texture that tends to get frizzy. This smooths it, plus gives it a little volume and shine. If I dry it with a diffuser, it gives my waves and curls some nice definition — zero frizz. I also found out by accident it even helps my hair look nice if I don’t do anything but let it air dry. And it makes second day hair a breeze: I just wet it down, spray a little bit of this in it and dry with the diffuser. FINALLY. My hair used to look like an evergreen bush on the second day; now it’s easy to tame. This could be a new HG styling product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love bumble and bumble products so I really wanted to love this, but I was pretty disappointed… It didn’t make my hair smoother, I could actually feel the product stuck on my hair, like it never soaked in. Will be returning :/

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: new fav ! i've always been a heat protectant denier & i've tried them all !! but this one made me change my mind. i have super thick curly frizzy hair and heat protectants usually make my hair sticky and a gross texture. this one left no texture at all! my hair feels great and smoother after straightening. smells so good too !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this to help moisturize and smoothen my hair. It seriously doesn’t do anything for my hair.. doesn’t make it feel or even look smoother. And I used very generously. Now I am around the end of the bottle and definitely feel like it had 0 benefit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell and if you have thick hair, it makes it smooth and nice just apply it on wet hair before styling. I have light hair and I may stick to Moroccan products for my type of hair but highly recommend this one for people with thick or frizzy hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells just fine, but does it actually do anything? I don’t think so I feel like I get just as many split ends from this as I did when I didn’t use it. Also the second ingredient on the list is alcohol which causes split ends, and is super damaging to your hair, just a no for me I’ll stick to the Morocconoil one.

This smells amazing and I have been using it for the past few weeks and have definitely noticed a difference in my hair after blow drying it. It is less frizzy and easier to manage. The scent lasts all day and I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have thick wavy hair, that tends to get really frizzy. I used this before I blew it out and just when I was leaving my hair wavy (knowing I’d touch it up with a curling iron) and I loved how soft my hair was both ways! It also smells so good.
I love this stuff and it does not make my hair oily. I spray it onto my hands and then work it in the mid and end sections of my hair before straightening. It smells great too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I need a hair UV and heat protector so severely, and bumble and bumble primer is the answer for all I want it. I like this product, and it makes my hair so smooth and frizz-free also, my hair smells just like a salon (in a good way). I 100% recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This spray smells like it’s straight out of the salon! Absolutely love the way it feels in my hair too. It doesn’t feel too heavy, and helps my hair stay straight and frizz free when I blow dry. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product! My hair feels so soft and smooth after it’s styled, I’d say this product needs more hype!! absolutely recommend if your hair is dry/frizzy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love all Bumble & Bumble products and this one is truly fantastic! It's my favorite heat protectant that I've used. It's so so important to use a good heat protectant, especially when using hot tools. I love that this one leaves my hair feeling smooth and shiny. It also smells great! This product was given to me by Bumble and Bumble but I truly love it and will continue using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t find the product to be anything out of the ordinary, but it did a good job of serving as a heat protectant and feta going/softening my hair. However, similar products can be found for significantly cheaper, so I’m not sure I would repurchase this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

It also feels/looks like it has more volume. Love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: bumble and bumble hairdresser’s invisible oil has been so amazing on my hair!! it is not only a heat protectant but also protective from uv rays!! i use it as a primer for my hair before i style it & it has changed my hair look completely!!! i love it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product so much! Been looking for something to help mantain my frizz when using heat and this is absolutely perfect! Also makes my hair shiny and smooth when just air drying. Definitely a new staple in my hair routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this leave in conditioner! It is really good at detangling my hair and makes it super easy to brush through. I also love that it protects my hair from the sun! I don’t have any other hair products that do that!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have loved using the Bumble and bumble Hairdressers Invisible Oil Primer on my hair when it's damp after the shower. It has made it easy to detaingle and makes my hair feel nourished. I have noticed a lot less frizz after my hair dries.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this on damp hair after washing, and it makes my fine hair so soft and manageable! My hair normally gets very tangled. This also seems to speed up my blow drying time a little bit.  I would definitely repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s my go to, even when I’m not using heat! Detangles and protects, I’ve noticed a huge difference

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing!! My hair is super frizz prone and this is the only product that actually keep it’s completely frizz free all day after styling. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the amount you get and that it is in a liquid format. That way I feel like it gives me an extra hydration and a hand at the time to detangle because doing that on my curly, long and color treated hair is not an easy task. I also love it's UV protection. The only thing that I wish it would be better at is that it would add more softness to ny hair after hot styling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: THE best detangler EVER! I swear this product works miracles AND adds moisture, nourishment, shine & heat protection? Count me in. Words can’t describe how amazing this product is and it lasts forever! A little goes a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product and have not found any others out there that work well and do not ruin a good hair day.  I was concerned that it was going to make my hair oily, as I have baby fine hair, it does not. I dry and straighten my hair everyday. This product helps protect from the heat and has a wonderfully light fragrance. Complimentary from Bumble bumble.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm always looking for the best products to protect my hair from heat damage and this Bumble and Bumble primer is one of the best I've tried. I'm a big fan of the scent (it smells SO good) and the product doesn't feel oily on my hair. It feels very smooth and leaves my hair feeling silky and looking more shiny while still protecting it from heat damage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised by this! My sister has used it for years and raved about it but we have different hair types so I wasn’t sure it was for me. (My hair is medium-thick and naturally wavy whereas hers is much more fine, thin, and straight.) I found myself wishing the scent lasted longer but I love that it didn’t weigh my hair down or make it feel sticky!   My only real “complaint” is I felt like my hair was harder to style on day 4-5 compared to when not using the product. It was fine when I first straightened it on day 2 hair, but my hair eventually lost that straightness and became more curly/wavy, especially underneath and closest to my neck. When I went to re-straighten it, my hair took longer to style and it felt like it was harder to work the straightener through my hair.   I will say my toddler has curly hair and I spritzed this in her hair to refresh her curls and it worked really well!   Overall, I’m going to stick to only spritzing the top layer of my hair moving forward but I’ll definitely continue using it on my daughters, as well!

reviews.review_title: Great primer and doesn’t weight hair down
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this product a week ago and I’m loving how soft, shiny and bouncy my hair is. My hair tend to get frizzy on second day hair and I end up putting it on a bun, but with this primer it adds shine, eliminates frizz and doesn’t weight my hair down. The scent is very light and a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this product can be used on both wet and dry hair, and that it doubles as a leave-in conditioner! I’ve been looking for a heat protector for a long time, and I love that this is multipurpose (heat tools AND UV protection!).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had heard so much about this product and when I tried, it totally lived up to the expectations. What amazes me is that it’s a leave-in treatment that defrizzes, detangles, protects and conditions and it delivers EVERYTHING it promises without weighting my hair down. 10/10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great! I love using it as a heat protectant and as an oil just to freshen up my hair. It makes my hair soft and smooth without making it feel oily or built up. It also smells amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bumble and bumble per usual gives a great product at a good price and does exactly what it says it does. I used the product in toweled dried hair and blew my hair dry using a revlon brush dryer. My hair came out looking healthy with little frizz and hydrated :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It's... fine. Just like every other hair oil, detangler, or primer I've tried, this one makes my scalp greasier quicker. I have a LOT of straight, long, balayaged Asian hair that tends toward greasy at the roots anyway, but after using this, my hair felt stringy after about half a day. It does help detangle a little, but my hair isn't usually difficult to detangle anyway. Didn't feel like it did much to hydrate the ends of my hair either. Still on the hunt for a good leave-in hair product but haven't found it yet, and this isn't it...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The only hair primer that works for my wavy/curly hair. I always stock up on this Invisible oil during the sale. Very light weight and works amazing on any hair type. Doesn't weigh down my hair or make my hair look greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just repurchased this product. It smells great and I feel like it provides good protection without weighing down fine hair.

reviews.review_title: Best Heat protectant I have ever used!

reviews.review_text: I have used Bumble and Bumble products for years now. This Heat/UV primer is incredible for protection against heat damage. I struggle with very fine/thin hair and major frizz. Also, I highly recommend buying the travel size as well for your carry-on and on-the-go needs.

reviews.review_title: Huge fan of this line!! You won’t be disappointed

reviews.review_text: I’m a huge have of this collection. It works best as a system, but I find the the styling products do  perform great alone to tame the frizz. I’ve used it both on fresh washed hair days and on days that my hair needs to be refreshed. I have corkscrew curl pattern hair and this worked wonders on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been hearing about bumble and bumble for a while now and omg I understand the hype! You get a good amount of product and I can’t remember the last time my hair felt this soft and smooth with minimal frizz. I have thick curly hair and minimal frizz is as good as I’ll get because I live in a really humid environment. But this is chefs kiss

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: Great product for men and women alike
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bumble and bumble keeps impressing me! I love any time I can review hair products since my husband has such different texture hair than I do I get two perspectives! I have thin hair but lots of it. I’m 4 months postpartum and have dry, damaged hair. My husband has super dry curly hair. This worked well for both of us! My husband used it on his ends and I used it from midway down. It isn’t greasy or heavy on either of us and products do tend to get heavy on my hair. Lastly I’ll say, this smells amazing! My husbands words were “smells like a clean salon!”

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received a bottle of Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Primer  Bumble & Bumble  , and my hair looks SO smooth and pretty now! Before using this product, my hair looked frizzy and unkempt no matter how I styled it. Now it looks smooth and soft. I will never go back to my old product, this stuff is amazing. It can be used on damp OR dry hair!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is AMAZING! I have processed blonde hair and my ends were super dry. I just added a little to them and they literally came back to life! My hair gets super dry in the summer and this product is going to be a life saver!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used bumble products before but never this one! I use heat on my hair weekly so I always use a leave in conditioner after washes. I love the thickness of this spray! It really coats my damp hair and protects it against styling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: He usado los productos de bb y de verdad que se han vuelto indispensables en mi rutina de cabello, me deja el pelo super suave y brillozo a pesar de que me lo he decolorado muchísimas veces. Super recomendado!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this product does everything i need!! i was initially drawn to this because i needed to get a new heat protectant anyway. after reading the claims and using it a couple times, i'm obsessed. aside from being a heat protectant, it just makes my hair look and feel so much better—less frizzy and more moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this hair primer and it’s great for detangling those knots in your hair right after the shower I love the smell of it it’s like a really light sand so it right after you blow dry your hair you won’t smell it at all but definitely does give it more of a plump to my hair and it looks more volume and shiny as well which that’s what I really love about

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This hair spray is the perfect one I was looking for.  It gives my hair super shiny looking and there is no more frizz. I used so many hair oil spray but no one worked like this. It has very good ingredients that can help my hair grow healthy.  This product is not just to fight frizz it gives moisture and protect hair from UV. The smell is great I highly recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This hair product is definitely one of my new faves! It’s so lightweight and doesn’t make your hair feel like it has product in it at all. It takes frizz and also smells amaaazinnggg!! I will definitely repurchase

reviews.review_text: This product is in disguise. It is NOT an oil as the package states. It’s a wonderfully light weight spray that helps tame frizz, give extra shine and even helps protect your hair from heated products. It’s wonderful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessing over this hair oil primer - it’s great for taming frizz. I put it on both when my hair was wet and dry. I prefer using it after washing my hair because my hair looked great when I blow dried it out! It’s also a bonus having UV protection since I live in Florida and I am always in the sun

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried almost every product from the Bumble and bumble. Hairdressers Invisible Oil line, and they're all incredible. I have frizzy, textured hair that needs a lot of product to tame it, and no line compares! Paired with the shampoo, conditioner, primer, and hair oil, my hair has never looked better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to use three different products in my hair. A leave in, a detangler, and a heat protectant. This one Product is not replaced all three and I couldn’t be happier that leaves my hair soft and smooth but also makes it feel like it’s protected. I love the added UV filter too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love curling my hair, so using heat protectant is a MUST. I love this product because it's not only a heat protectant but it also helps against UV damage which is super important because it's approaching summer so I'll def be soaking up some sunshine. I'm always amazed at how it detangles my hair and how soft it feels after. Overall, it's a great product if you're looking for a product that does it all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It works really well even on my curly frizzy hair the lightweight formula still is effective! I love using this on my wet hair and letting it air dry or diffuse and it helps nourish, defrizz and soften my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve always love Bumble & Bumble products so I was super excited when I got to try this! It sprays on so easily and smells great! I love using it with my other products right after I shower and blow dry my hair. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_text: This product is a game changer for me! It makes giving myself a blowout at home 100x easier. I spray it all over my hair while wet and then use it with my blowdry brush. It leaves my hair silky smooth and smelling AMAZING! Highly highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

The fragrance is overwhelming and unbearable. I’m not sensitive to fragrance usually but this was absolutely awful and gave me a headache for hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using cheap heat protectants for years now, and I've noticed that all of the blowdrying and straightening I do has made my hair really dry with lots of breakage and flyaways. So I started looking for better, more expensive heat protectants, and this one came up in so many recommendations.   First of all, one thing that I noticed about this product is that it is much more fairly priced compared to others like it. While it's expensive compared to drugstore products, compared to its other high-end brand competitors, such as the Kerastase Resistance Ciment Thermique Blow Dry Primer (which goes for $37 for 5.1oz) or the Oribe Balm D'or Heat Styling Shield (which is $45 for 3.4oz), this is a steal at $29 for 8.5oz.  And the thing is, with this product, you really don't need a lot. I have thick hair, and I probably use about 10 sprays before blowdrying, and less than that before straightening my hair, since I don't want my hair to be too wet before straightening it.  After blowdrying, this spray leaves a lustrous sheen all over my hair, and tames any flyaways/breakage that I'd usually have without using the spray. My hair feels so soft after using it, and it also smells so good - it's sweet but not cloying, like a light vanilla. The scent also lasts for quite a while, which was a nice surprise!   I also use this product before straightening my hair, but you can't use too much before straightening, because it can make dry hair feel a bit tacky if you use a lot. I just use around 7 to 8 sprays, and that's good enough to leave my hair looking shiny and healthy with minimal flyaways, which is a miracle after straightening it at over 400 degrees Fahrenheit (which is what I have to do to get my thick hair to straighten).  Ultimately, if you're looking to make the step up from drugstore heat protectants/primers to something a little more expensive but still affordable (which I strongly suggest you do), THIS is the product is that I'd suggest, for any and all hair types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: Love this product! I use it as a leave in; use it between washes to add hydration if my hair is dry; and I use it as a heat protectant before blow drying! I’ve also gifted this to multiple people as it’s just a staple and works with so many hair types. I have blonde/fine hair and it doesn’t weigh down my hair or make it look greasy. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: The BEST Product in Their Invisible Oil Line!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Good: I got to review quite a lot of products from this line over the last few months in large-ish sample sizes. I somehow acquired 2-3 minis of this and loved the product enough to purchase a full-size of this after I ran out. I also want to point out this is the ONLY product from the invisible oil line that I felt was good enough for me to repurchase it. I'm extremely impressed with this primer, it's more of a thicker and milkier formula in comparison to a misty dry-oil spray like most primers come in. At first I thought I would hate it for that reason, but it's actually fantastic! I have natural curly and fine hair that sometimes gets frizzy especially due to weather factors and oily consistencies in primers can oftentimes make my hair simply look oily and unwashed. This is the perfect solution to this. I also love using this as primer under heat styling products, it doesn't make my hair overly wet (unless I overdo it) and it's easy to comb through. It doesn't sizzle when damp under heat styling tools like many other water based primers tend to do and there's no gross scent after the heat touches your hair with this on. The overall scent on this product is very nice, vibrant and light. I had a former go-to primer but I tend to reach for this one more simply due to the fact that it doesn't make my hair oily even if I accidentally over-do it (unlike the other primer). This is the sample I ran out of first despite having multiples of it and truly the star of the invisible oil line from Bumble and Bumble. Skip the other products and try this one first.   The Bad: The nozzle on this is subpar and can spray funky sometimes both in my regular size and the mini bottles. For the price it sells for I believe the spray nozzle could and should be better.   The Ugly/Honest: I think this product is a bit overpriced (as seems to be the theme in bumble and bumble products) however, it IS a good product. I deducted one star due to the spray nozzle and high price point.

But this has absolutely worked a miracle on my hair, which had become very dry the last few months.  I have very thick, coarse, curly/wavy hair which I often blow out straight. My hair has never felt so refreshed and beautiful.

reviews.review_text: I never care to write reviews for anything, but this product is absolutely phenomenal! I have curly, thin, hair - so I'm always searching for a great heat protectant. At first I was under the impression that it would make my hair kind of heavy, but I was wrong. Its super lightweight! My hair is super soft, less frizzy, and it feels healthy/hydrated. It also has such a great smell! I use it before using heat and even when I don't. Love everything about this product!

Instantly detangles, adds shine, reduces frizz without leaving hair greasy. I don’t use heat products, but I do appreciate how this is an all in one leave in. I have long colored hair with dry ends, and this slightly helps prevent fading of my color- I think color protecting shampoos, reducing hair washing to 2-3x a week, and avoiding sun exposure are all more effective. This has a milky consistency, so it distributes well- I only need 3-4 sprays to cover my very long hair. The smell isn’t too overpowering or artificial; it’s vanilla with honeysuckle. Unless you concentrate the product at your ends, it won’t condition dry ends as well as heavier products. I recommend layering a cream based product over split/dry ends. Great value for the price. One bottle has lasted me one year even though I use it 3 times a week.
