reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: if you are someone who blow dries or applies heat, then this is a really good protectant. keeps my hair soft and can't say much about the control frizz. the fragrance doesn't matter to me but if you are sensitive to smell then don't bother. really liked it after using the sample size and then got the big bottle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not worth the money, in my opinion. I have blonde, highlighted hair it is fine, wavy and prone to frizz. This product did have a nice fragrance, but did nothing to control my frizz.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I’m happy with this product as it helps me comb through my long (wavy) wet hair after washing. Frizz is tamed down although I wouldn’t say this is a miracle solution. The size of the bottle is difficult for me to hold. It’s awkward to get a good grip to be able to spray evenly. A slimmer bottle would solve this problem for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My hair feels soft and smells amazing after using this product! I also feel like the quantity is a good size. A disadvantage of this oil is that I find it makes my hair greasier than other products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves my hair crazy soft and feels very protected for a blow dry. No stickiness. Got as a sample and will def be purchasing a full size!

reviews.review_title: I never say this but Holy Grail!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is a life saver. I have platinum/silver hair that gets bleached to death every month and therefore I was told not to wash it everyday. At night I sleep with a humidifier next to me and when I wake up my hair is a total mess. It’s frizz city. So I spray this all over my dry hair and comb it through. My hair is instantly back to normal! I also use on damp hair just before drying. I never get any build up and my hair is never weighed down no matter how many times I use it. I’ll be buying this again and again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: while I wanted to love this product, when I used it on my hair when it was wet, it dried my hair out and made it feel sticky and straw like. When I tried it to refresh my curls, it made my hair feel even worse. However, it does smell very pleasant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This does the job as a heat protectant, and I like that it doesn’t have a strong scent. As for the de-frizzing and detangling claims, I didn’t really see much difference in my hair compared to when I don’t use the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Does the job. Has a strong coconut smell and tends to leave the hair kinda greasy. Def have to wash it out after using it all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this product so bad as I love Bumble and Bumble products. However, this product made my hair feel super flat and oily. Felt like I had no volume whatsoever even after drying and styling my hair. Other primers I have used in the past give me volume and shine. The only thing I like about this product is it smells amazing! This produce Did not work well with my hair unfortunately. I have thin hair but a lot of it. Maybe avoid if you also have thinner hair.

reviews.review_title: Good for UV protection and hydrated hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I live in Texas and am outside for a good portion of the day. The sun can be pretty harsh on my hair and skin, so I wanted something for my hair that had UV protection. I have tried this one and one from the Moroccan Oil brand, and I would say that this leaves my hair feeling more hydrated. The smell isn't overwhelming and it can be used on damp or dry hair (making it easy for me to apply mid-day when I'm about to go out into the harsh sun.) I will say that this product is pricey (that's why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5,) and if you're looking for heat/UV protection there are definitely cheaper options, but they might not make your hair feel as hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have beeb using this for about a year, changed my hair, it feels great and lasts until next wash.  Not a perfume smell, and you don't need a ton.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the product, I feel like it makes my hair more manageable during the day.

reviews.review_title: Wanted to love it but meh
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing special, it really didn't do anything for my frizz, just smells nice. I only use this when im going to style my hair and helps as heat protectant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i’m not too sure why the reviews for this product are overwhelmingly positive... i wanted so badly to like it, but i find using this product does absolutely nothing for my hair. it doesn’t minimize frizz, doesn’t make it shiny, doesn’t seem to protect it when i use heat..consider me confused.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing + really detangles & cuts down frizz. I never blowdry my hair before a few sprays of this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have incredibly short, fine, frizzy hair and I was looking for a leave in conditioner/primer that would not way down my hair but tame my unruly flyaways. This stuff works to do just that, while smelling incredible, and keeping my hair touchable soft!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair
reviews.review_text: I cannot stress enough how AMAZING this stuff is. I have fine wavy albeit poofy hair and this made my hair extremely soft. Loveeeeee 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. I’m on my second bottle the scent is either a hit or miss but this product makes my hair feel so smooth

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use it by spraying on wet/ towel dried hair and let it sit until I decide to blow dry my hair. I really like the product, it’s not sticky, smells good and leaves my hair fairly soft, without frizz.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my hair feel so soft and smooth. Also knowing that it protects my hair from beta and UV makes this an all round product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately a no go for me - tried once and left my hair a sticky mess and I was careful to not overdo it with application. Does smell nice though, hence 2 stars. Returning this product.

reviews.review_title: literally like you just left the hair salon
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this when I am going to put heat in my hair such as just before I straighten my hair out and it literally makes my hair look like I just left a hair salon I apply the oil with it and my hair super soft and feels amazing and last a while

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This invisible oil has been a game changer for my hair. I use it to refresh my hair on non-shampoo days and it smooths frizz and redefines my curls. Nothing has ever worked like this. I have dry hair so adding this oil never causes a problem for me... I've tried dozens of products, this works.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff!! I have the worst hair and i use this right after the shower and i blow dry my hair. Sometimes i use on my hair before using a flat iron or a crimper. Before using this, i primise my hair was always crunchy and flyaway! Now it’s smooth and healthy looking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve just started using this product. I have very thick, curly hair. I love how my hair feels, product doesn’t leave a sticky residue & makes quick work of running a brush through it. However, I don’t particularly like the smell,…..it reminds me of insect repellent. Overall, it’s a good product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It smells great, works great and I will absolutely buy it again. I use it on my ends to seal in some moisture. Would definitely not put it all over my hair as it is heavy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff. I use it after the shower & then the next 2-3 days I use it on the ends of my dry hair. Definitely have noticed a difference. My hair is so soft and the smell is super light and not strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I bought the mini just to try but will absolutely be buying the big one. I have coarse thick hair which is easily knotted and I use this post shower on damp hair and then used a one-step styler to style my hair and my hair has never been softer. My one thing is that it’s not very concentrated so I had to use quite a bit of product on my thick hair but not being concentrated is probably good since it will avoid over-oiliness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT. Great smell, does the job, and a bottle lasts me quite a long time considering I use it nearly every day.

reviews.review_title: Makes My Hair Dry and Prone to Knots
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I know this gets good reviews but it doesn’t work for my fine hair at all, and I’ve tried it twice, years ago and again recently. It leaves my hair very dry at the ends and prone to little knots. I’ve used it on damp hair but as soon as I blow dry my hair is hard to comb through (even with a wide pick) and prone to knotting and breakage. I’ve also tried using it on dry hair to revive waves and same problem, once it dries down my hair is hard to comb through. A conditioning product shouldn’t be like this. It’s a complete fail for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't have frizzy hair, but I have flyaways all over. I could see a result the first time I used it! My hair was soft and tame. What I love the most is I have thin hair and it didn't weigh my hair down causing me to lose volume at all! Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has become essential to my daily routine, whether my hair be freshly washed or unwashed hair. I also use this product on my Cashmere hair extensions. I feel like it gives my hair life, and it makes the extensions feel like silk. My hair looks and feels healthier directly after using this product... even after ONE use. I think I've purchased this product about 6 times, and it is a MUST in my travel kit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: NEVER HAD SUCH A GOOD PRIMER FOR MY HAIR.. AS I HAVE LOT OF HAIR FALL...BUT AFTER THE USE OF THIS PRIMER, WHICH I USED ON DAMP HAIR, AFTER WASH.. LOVED IT. JUST LOVED IT . MY HAIR HAD A LIFT ,LIKE VOLUME,, AFTER I BLOW DRIED THEM..LOVED IT ...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m still figuring this out. It does leave your hair soft, yay! But it can be a little sticky. I’ve tried it on both wet and dry hair and for my thick hair it works best as almost a dry shampoo to refresh my style.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use this as a primer on damp hair before blow drying and straightening my hair. It works very well and i usually finish with a heat and humidity resistant hair spray.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best!!  Works for tangles like nothing else.  I use this for myself and my children’s hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Swear by bumble and bumble invisible oil line.  It makes my hair so soft and healthy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing! I use heat to my hair all the time and this works perfectly to protect it.

reviews.review_title: mixed feelings, but worth a try!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I can't tell if I like this product. I'm returning the full size and replacing with the trial so I don't feel guilty for the loss if it doesn't work out.  I have oily roots and extremely dry ends, so I usually wash and condition every other day because my ends are so dry on day 2. I was hoping this product would help the dry ends so my hair style can last longer between washes. So far, it leaves my hair feeling AMAZING immediately — but within minutes after the product dries my hair is left dry and tangled. I've found that jojoba oil is best for making my fine, dry hair feel healthy, but I really wanted a product that focuses on heat/UV protection. I think this product is definitely worth a shot, though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worth the price point for me personally. While this didn't particularly help the frizz a whole lot - only to some degree. It definitely made my hair soft and very easy to brush. I like using it while my hair is damp in the evenings, and it keeps my hair the way it is overnight. It doesn't make my hair feel sticky or clumped up together after spraying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this spray! I actually had my hairdresser recommend the product and once she tried on my hair, I knew I had to get it straight away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: best hair product  makes my hair shiny and helps with hair color to fade less

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Seriously love this stuff! Got it as a sample and have already bought 2 bottles now. Smells wonderful and makes my hair look great and easy to brush. Also great price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It leaves my hair feeling incredibly sticky and makes it feel drier than it felt before. The smell is nice though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. Been using it for years. Smells heavenly and makes my hair smooth, shiny and healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: With all the good reviews thought I would give this a try. This was terrible. It did absolutely nothing for my frizz. It didn't even make my hair smooth. I bought the regular size now I wish I would have ordered the travel size. I've used it a few times so far & I've used a lot better products. Will use the rest of this maybe it'll get better & I'll update my review. We'll see.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a staple hair product for me. I first tried this spray years ago when I was looking for a product to protect my hair from the sun on a vacation and I've been using it ever since! It helps detangle my hair and makes me feel extra fresh after washing and conditioning because it smells AMAZING! I always get compliments on my perfume when I'm wearing this, even if I'm not wearing any actual fragrance. If you are someone who uses a lot of heat on your hair or who spends a lot of time in the sun I definitely recommend giving this a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use heat tools regularly to style my hair & also have dry hair, so thought this product would be perfect for me. I was wrong. I tried using it numerous times with varying amounts of primer but, always ended up with greasy looking hair. Even if it protects from heat, it’s not worth the end result.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have thick, 3A/3B curly hair and I got this product to use if I blow dry or heat style my hair. When I apply it, I don't notice any difference in my hair except that it smells nicer. However the next day, my hair feels extra greasy and dirty and I feel like washing it, even if I just washed it. I had high hopes but it just doesn't work for my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have exclusively been using this on my hair for a few years now and I’ve lost track of how many bottles I’ve bought. Great scent. Great protection against heat and UV damage. Never heavy or greasy and it takes a while to go through a full sized bottle. Love love love! Helps tone down my frizz as well! I’d recommend this to anyone and everyone! JUST BUY IT!! Worth the $$$$

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Highly recommend. Smells really good. And it is Dr.Dray approved (if you watch her YouTube channel!).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As much as i wanted to love it, this product only made my hair more dry and less manageable. I have dry, thick and frizzy hair, and i was at least hoping to tame down the frizz and make detangling easier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing!. I’ve damaged my hair with coloring and styling and this  It makes my hair sooo smooth! I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product as it makes my hair less frizzy & staticky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It definitely made my hair look less frizzy and calm but it was heavy and i don’t like way it made my hair feel or smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE. Smells so good. Has definitely made my hair smoother. Helps with frizz. Made my hair look so much healthier. Definitely recommend for anyone who uses heat tools or who lives in a hot and humid state.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using the invisible oil with great results and decided to add the protective primer to my routine too. I have salt and pepper grey hair and the texture has changed and it’s coarse. These two products make my hair silky soft, regardless if I wear it curly or straight. A little goes a long way with both items so it’s worth the money. These will be purchased again.

reviews.review_title: Not for my fine, curly hair. Smells like vanilla.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t like this UV protector. It has a vanilla smell that gave me a headache after awhile and the fragrance didn’t wear off, even overnight. (If that’s what you’re going for, you may love this product for that, though!) Also, it made my fine, curly hair feel sticky. Then stickiness may have worn off after using a hair straightener, but I don’t use one because I let my hair air dry. I purchased this product to protect my hair from the hot California sun, and I didn’t like this one. I prefer the olaplex #7 oil for that =) cheers

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So far I’m liking this product. I love all of the benefits this has and is perfect especially for summer with the sun constantly beaming on your hair causing damage. However, I disagree with its instructions when they say you can’t use too much...you can. It’s not like Color Wow’s Dream Coat when they really do mean spray liberally. I tried doing exactly what it tells me for medium to thick hair and my hair ended up feeling greasy and just a weird filmy feeling. After reading some reviews of others saying to spray in your hand instead of directly to your hair I decided to try that and it worked so much better! My hair didn’t feel greasy and it was nice and soft. Overall I think this is a promising product, just keep in mind that a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my hair very soft after blow dry or after straightening my hair. Very light weight feel and no oily weigh down. 10/10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so confused why this has high ratings? First the bottle is kinda hard to spray. Second I don’t feel like it does much protecting. My hair has become so damaged since I started using this instead of what I was using before. Third, it’s hard to explain but it’s a little heavy and takes forever to “soak” into my hair, otherwise it just creates steam when heat touches it- further damaging my hair. Even when it does dry, it feels disgusting. Wouldn’t repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells so good and made my hair so soft and detangled a huge knot i had in my hair in no time and it did not hurt

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! I have long, ash blond hair that’s on the thinner side and this spray works so well for my flyaways and hydrates without weighing my hair down or giving it an oily feel.   I find it also softens my hair hair and gives it a nice shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: At first, I did not like it. I have fine damaged hair due to bleaching. I sprayed it directly to my hair and did not like it. I’ve read that for fine hair, you have to spray product on your hand and apply. When I did that, I was blown away with how it detangles and made my 3 day old hair smelling and feeling fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: You have to find the right balance for your hair thickness and length. Initially I tried this and hated it, but after reading some helpful reviews I gave it another chance. What works for my thin, long hair is spraying it on my hands and working it into damp, clean hair. I mix it with the BB invisible oil and it won't leave a residue or hair feeling crunchy. According to other reviews it does seem like the formal varies from bottle to bottle so I'm not a fan of the inconsistency. I would recommend trying a sample or the mini size first before jumping to the big bottle.

reviews.review_title: I love love love this product!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: THE BEST detangler and heat protectant! I’ve gone through 2 bottles and just ordered a third. I love this product and would recommend!

reviews.review_title: Product is nice...but promotion items missing..
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product does the job. My thick Italian-girl hair is naturally dark but has heavy blond highlights that dry out at the ends. So long as I’m  using a moisturizing, high quality shampoo and conditioner, this product takes care of the rest of the dryness. It smells great too!! But then again, Sephora experiences have gotten really negative for me as of late... I didn’t receive any of my samples with this last order, nor did they give me the 500 bonus points promised when I purchased over 50$ worth of online product. I understand that those were promotional incentives to buy, and I didn’t “pay” for them per say, but a vendor should honor its promotions and not cheat you out of the promised perks of buying. For this reason, I rate my transaction for this product as a three star experience. The product itself is great, but I may not purchase from Sephora anymore if this dishonest promotional treatment keeps up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t usually purchase hair products more than once bc I’m always trying to find a new HG. But this is a product I’ve bought maybe 2 or 3 times bc I find that nothing beats it in terms of detangling and making my hair super soft. I’ll bring this with me on trips where I’m staying in a hotel or someplace and know that their standard little bottles of shampoo and conditioners they provide won’t be moisturizing enough. Or I’ll bring it on trips where I’ll be swimming and will spray a ton of it into my hair before putting it into a bun to swim. My hair is always protected and doesn’t get dagamged as a result.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is 5 stars !!! Let my hair so soft I love so much

reviews.review_title: one of the better value spray primers
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After trying a couple spray on leave in primers, this one is the most effective and cost efficient. I use this to help detangle dry bleached ends, before going in with a second leave in conditioner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product.It smells fantastic, easy to apply, really does what it claims, and makes my hair super soft. It is not overly expensive and lasts a long time for me I used it every day and it lasted me about six months. The only downside to this product is that if you have thinner hair like me it does tend to wear your hair down.This product is meant for medium to thick hair but I still use it anyways because I love the smell. Hopefully they will make a similar one for thinner hair types.

reviews.review_title: Don’t hate it, but also not a repurchase for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine, frizzy, to wavy hair.   I had high hopes for this product, but personally it did not offer what I was looking for.  My hair was shiny and it detangled my hair pretty well.  However, it felt like the frizz never wanted to leave. Which is my biggest insecurity for my hair. It also felt like it weighed down my waves which irks me because I love my natural hair.  Probably not for my hair type, but still a decent product for the shine and detangling

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! Long thick hair- so I went through the bottle pretty quick. Will buy more when I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the smell of this bad boy. Easy to use. Great for my hair. One of the best heat protectant spray Ive ever used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best detangler ever! I bought this for my daughter who has super long hair that gets knotted and matted from being in the pool. She LOVES it! She said it makes her hair so easy to brush and leaves her hair really soft and shiny. I’m so grateful to have found a product that helps take her knots out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I personally really liked this product. I would only use it on the day I wash my hair though and apply it on damp hair bc I hate using these types of products on dry hair that make my hair feel wet. This also feels more like a liquid/serum to me than an oil since it makes my hair wet when applied on dry hair . Regardless , I love how this product controls my frizz & smells like the salon !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells good, honestly feel like it does nothing to help my hair. I have medium thickness super oily roots hair, it gets frizzy really easily and this didn’t really do anything to help that. I mainly only spray it in for heat protection and use a different leave in and oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute favourite!! Makes my hair look shiny and beautiful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received a trial size of this and had expected to like it but it left my fine hair feeling dirty/oily. I used this in my hair when it was partly dry and it seemed to prevent my hair from fully drying and eventually left it feeling waxy causing a lot of tangles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product has a really nice, light scent and is really easy to work through my hair. It does not weigh my hair down, despite my hair being quite fine, and it provides good protection for my hair when I use heat to style.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this!!! Great for when I am blow drying my hair, and awesome those fly always between washes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I experience a lot of breakage and struggle to grow my hair. This helped me grow my hair longer than I was ever able to. I used this primer every morning before going out. I only stopped using it because I am trying to stick to silicone free products.

reviews.review_title: Product is effective and good value for money
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have wavy 2A/2B hair with a bit of frizz and texture. I received this product in a trial size with a hair care kit I bought. I used up the entire sample and ended up buying the full size because it worked really well to protect my hair from heat, smooth my frizz and prime my hair for styling. Since that first purchase, I’ve purchased it twice again and will continue to remain a staple in my hair care routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This did absolutely nothing for my hair!  I sprayed it on after shampooing/conditioning and it improved nothing on my hair.  I thought it would smooth it or coat it but nothing happened.  Completely underwhelmed. Did not tame frizz in any way!!!!!

reviews.review_title: Great for keeping hair soft and healthy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves my hair feeling super smooth! I use it before I blow dry and it keeps it healthy. Smells nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I spray this on wet hair before blow drying or air drying, and spray it in again when it’s like half dry. It smells SO GOOD and I love that it has a moisturizing feel in spray form versus a tacky/drying feel like some sprays. I feel like the value is good too and it seriously smells amazing. I am picky with smells and it’s not overly sweet or cloying, smells fresh and nice.

reviews.review_title: My new holy grail hair product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using it for a while now mainly to detangle my hair and help with the frizz because it just does the job really well! This product really helps soften my hair and detangle it no matter how messed up my hair is, lol. Amazes me every time. It also provides a good amount of protection against the heat and the smell is just heavenly! I’m about to buy a second bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff does the job it’s supposed to, but it unfortunately leaves my hair so so greasy if I use more than 1 spray. I have to use only the slightest amount for it to not ruin my hair :/ i have medium hair so this probably works well for people with thick hair. All that said, I do love the smell!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this for my dry and thick hair! Made it very soft and less frizzy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Is good for detangling hair- my hair is less frizzy and softer as smells great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This made my hair so oily and did not help with frizz at all. Hated how my hair felt, super dirty and I couldn’t wait to clean it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this as a primer and also a refresher for my curls! It is so lightweight and does not weigh down my hair!  The smell is also very nice and the results are seen almost instantly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing! It enhances my natural waves and helps me detangle my hair. I like that there’s some UV protection as well especially with summer coming up. It kind of smells like Moroccan oil which I love!

reviews.review_title: worth it, get the oil too
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have this and I find it makes my hair very smooth. Sets me up for easy curled hair without the frizz.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely one of my new every day, essential hair products. I use it mostly as a detangler and an anti-frizz spray, on days when I haven’t showered. It makes my hair so soft and frizz free!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For reference I am of South Asian descent and have thick curly/wavy hair. I recently bought this to tame my frizz and for the UV protection. It smells great without being too strong and helps control the frizz. These days I am not using any heat for my hair (I also let it air dry), so I bought this to control the frizz from my natural hair and loved how lightweight it is. I took one star off because I don’t think it lasts all day - it de-frizzes my hair in the morning but by late afternoon I have to put some more in. It could just be my hair type or the weather. I would still recommend the product as its light weight, does the job and smells good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell and texture, and a little seems to go a long way! Makes my hair so smooth and easy to blow dry. Helps with tangles for sure, and my hair feels soft through my next wash

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I put this in my hair after every shower!  My hair is very thick and healthy with my roots always a little oily. I don't use products, heat or colour and I use a straightner maybe once every 3 months for special occasions.  The best way to explain this product is it helps de-tangle, smells light and floral, light product, makes my hair silky and shiny without the grease.  Best.Find.Ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s great, but I feel like I could find something better out there. With this product there is about one spray of difference between frizz-fighting and straight oiliness, so maybe my hair needs something a little lighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: smells nice and leaves my hair shiny. a little less frizzier than when I don’t use it but good for the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for 3 years on my 2c/3a hair. I put some in the palm of my hand, rub my hands together, and then rake it through my hair before applying gel. It smells amazing and light. I have many allergies to perfumes, and this scent doesn’t bother me at all. I can’t imagine not using it since it really smoothes and lightly conditions my very coarse, porous hair. I also use the actual B and B oil in the orange bottle also on days I don’t shampoo. That is phenomenal as well. I’ve tried EVERY silicone product for ends after drying, and that is the only one that actually softens my hair and works. I’m 50 yo and always have had wavy/curly/frizzy hair. I’ve spent thousands on trying to formulate a routine. Washing only 2 times a week helps, but I can’t imagine life without this product, the orange bottled oil, and the shampoo. It’s worth the cost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful product that provides extra protection from the elements.  Works well for my wavy thick colored hair and my daughter's straight hair without weighing it down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a small sample of this product and decided to give it a try. I have straight, colored hair with not a lot of body. I love this product and has made styling my hair a breeze.. I also use it to refresh my hair between washings which is usually every other day. I definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Staple for everyday use.  Helps protect and keeps the frizz to a minimum.  Helpful when blow drying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this has to be the worst product ive ever bought from sephora. All it does is make my hair EXTREMELY oily while being disgustingly dry. It literally makes your hair look and feel worse. It also causes my hair to get caught in the straightener alllllll the time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: On my second bottle. Will buy again and again. My hair is so soft and healthier than ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great and protects my hair from damage from frequent blow drying and straightening. Doesn't leave my hair feeling heavy or oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Easy application, lightweight product. This is my favorite detangle heat protective spray . Smell really nice and a little bit of products goes along way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Does the job, smells great. Doesn't leave a residue on the hair, which I like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go to heat protector. Smells great and love the application bottle. It’s not too heavy of a product so your hair still has volume but with shine and no frizz.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product!  I’ve consistently repurchased as I have run out. I use as a leave-in conditioner and it works great to soften and detangle without weighing my hair down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I must not have the right type of hair for this product. It did absolutely nothing for me. I have baby fine hair, stick straight. It's very hard for me to find any products that work for me. If you have normal hair, especially with some body to it, it should work for you just fine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because my hairdresser told me it's so important that I always use a heat protector on my hair when styling. I went with Bumble & Bumble as I've heard great things about the brand.  I use a generous amount (maybe 6 sprays) around my head when my hair is wet. It helps with detangling slightly and I feel like when I blow dry my hair and then wave it with a straightener it helps maintain my style.   It makes me hair appear a bit thicker and fuller (not sure if the products coat your stands), but I love the look it gives. This is what I love about it most.   It smells good, but I am a bit weary of inhaling the fumes so I try to not breathe it in. My only wish was that this product was clean - if it was fully clean and didn't worry about what I was breathign in, I would give it 5 stars!   When I air dry my hair and spray it in, I don't notice a massive difference with frizz. Perhaps it's a touch more moisturizing, but overall I prefer using this product before heat styling.   I'd re-purchase this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product - I would use this instead of oil or cream. Smells nice, I would spray a handful in my hand and then apply equally that way. My hair would feel so smooth afterwards.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Seriously this stuff is Bananas !  My once frizz ball of a head turned into a manageable one just by spritzing 3-4 sprays throughout my hair . On my second bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff smells amazing and feels really light and nice on my hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! Smells so nice and my hair feels softer and less frizzy. I kept looking for a spray to use before blow drying for heat protection and this was perfect, plus protecting from UV was an incredible added bonus since I colour my hair and know it fades in the summer. Just buy it if you keep looking at it, I wasted tome not jumping on it sooner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ce produit a changé pour le mieux la texture de mes cheveux. Très contente du résultat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: best hairstyle product ever. smells amazing. use as a detangler and hear protecter. my hairdresser gave it to me a couple years ago and i fell in love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely loved this product. It made my hair so soft! However, this primer made my skin breakout badly. I’ve never had blackheads and after using this product had the most terrible acne on the sides of my face that includes blackheads (which I’ve never had an issue with). I initially thought it was “mascne” but after stopping use of this product my acne has since cleared. Unfortunately, I would not recommend this hair primer for those with sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have coarse hair, and I finally caved and tried this after seeing it so often on the site. My hair definitely feels smoother!! Will definitely continue to buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely love my hair dresser recommend it for my curly dry hair and now I dont wanna live without it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have naturally oily hair, so it’s been hard to find products that work for my hair without causing my hair to look greasy. This product is amazing; my hair is super soft, and I’ve never gotten the oily look or feel while using the spray. It’s not a lie when the bottle says invisible oil! Truly the only product that has worked so well for me. I will continue to purchase this spray for as long as I can!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is actually one of my most favorite hair products!! Very easy to apply, smells good, and gives me a little kick in the midst of getting ready to leave my house!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical about using an oil in my hair at first but I love this stuff! I share with my daughter who has very different hair than me. I have fine curly hair, and this doesn’t weigh my hair down or make it greasy looking. My daughter has thick straight/wavy hair and is prone to greasy scalp, but this works well for her too. A little goes a long way

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My hair girl recommended this to me and I’m in love! It’s the only heat protectant that doesn’t make my thick, long hair greasy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Moisturizing for dry hair. One of my must haves.

reviews.review_title: A great addition to my styling routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this product!  It has noticeably made my hair more manageable for styling.  The ends of my hair are currently bleached, damaged, and frizzy, and this has helped to tame and nourish them before blow-drying.  It adds a great deal of extra shine and smoothness!  Would definitely purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have thin, curly hair and live in a super dry climate. This is such a lovely product to keep my hair soft and it may even be helping my hair look a bit healthier in between my haircuts. It's hard to tell if that's this product specifically, or just that I've been heat styling less often, but I love the way this makes my hair feel regardless. I only need a few spritzes when I get out of the shower, so this bottle is also lasting ages.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is great! A couple spritzes and I can brush my hair so easily after showering. Just be careful not to apply too much as you risk bringing it up into your roots with your brush and making your hair feel really greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have blonde curly/wavy hair that gets a ton sun of and saltwater through the summer, and lots of heat styling/straightening in the winter. After a lopping off a solid chunk of very fried ends, I’ve committed to doing more to prevent future damage. Just finished the smaller trial bottle, and my hair is loving it- super soft, and my ends look and feel so much healthier- ordering full size. I’ve loved the invisible oil for years, and this makes a great compliment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great product - I got this as my hair started thinning last year (stress...) and I wanted something to protect my hair from blow-drying. It smells lovely, isn’t greasy, and protects my hair well. It leaves it feeling softer afterwards, too. I got the largest bottle 3 months ago and I still have half of it left - great value for money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My hair has not felt so smooth and silky in years!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent product! Doesn't leave my hair oily and makes blowdrying and hair straightening much easier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This spray is great for protecting my hair against UV damage. Which also helps prevent breakage and aging. I just mist it all over my hair and I’m good to go. It doesn’t make my hair greasy either and it smells pretty good. Not a super strong scent though. Definitely recommend, it’s like sunscreen for your hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff!  I spray it on my hands and rub it on the ends of my hair.  It makes it so smooth and silky, and it smells amazing!  A bottle easily lasts me 3 years.  I'm on my 2nd bottle now.  I also have the travel size for when I travel since I can't live without it.  Great for colour treated hair.  I originally got this after I dyed my hair pastel purple, and it made it look great and not frizzy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair
reviews.review_text: I like that it is a heat protectant and it makes hair look soft BUT: 1.it weighs down my hair 2.i can feel a coat  of product around my hair, even when i use a little 3. The smell is more like a strong perfume, and not of a hair product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a holy grail product for me. I got it as a free sample a while back and absolutely loved it on the first use, so I immediately purchased the full size. It’s the only product I need to put in my hair after washing it to fight freeze and heat protect. I straighten my hair and then curl with a flat iron every time I wash my hair so I need a solid heat protectant, and the fact that this makes my hair so smooth and healthy to boot is a huge win. I find a little of this goes a long way. I don’t spray directly into my hair. I do three full sprays into the palm of my hand and finger comb through my hair. I have long hair, more than halfway down my back, and that amount more than takes care of my whole head.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this a free sample and love it! Will definitely be purchasing once i run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this to scrunch the crunch out of my hair.  It helps with frizz, and doesn't weigh down my fine 2b/c hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great detangler and heat protector. I feel like I'm going through it pretty quickly and it requires a lot to cover my hair. I wish it didn't come as a spray but instead a pump dispenser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product, my hair is super soft and shiny from using this. I received it as a sample and just purchased the 250ml. Definitely a product I'm keeping stocked!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING.  I style my hair every day for work and always have so many fly always.  I added this to my new hair care routine as it is made for dry hair.  WONDERFUL.  I touched my hair frequently as I was drying and straightening to see if my hair was super hot or remained normal temp.  My hair did not burn nor overheat the whole time!!  Additionally, it seems much more hydrated than when I use a general heat protectant.  10/10 recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve repurchased this 6 times. It’s hydrating, has UV protections and is perfect before I use my dyson dryer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I could give this more than 5 stars. This whole line is my absolute favorite. The smell is amazing and it works beautifully. My hair comes out soft, shiny, no tangles, no frizies, nothing. Defintely 1 of a kind. LOVE it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so happy I bought the small size of his product. It is incredibly drying. I already have dry hair and this seemed to make things worse after I used it basically my hair didn't move. I would have preferred a gel or cream to a spray as well. If you have dry hair I would not recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: love this stuff. i had gotten a sample and fell in love with it. it's a great size for the price and really makes my hair feel amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Protects hair from heat, love the smell and makes my hair shiny
