reviews.review_text: I really love this product, I just spray it on before I blow dry my hair. Before I used this product my hair would be dry and crunchy after blow drying, but now it’s shiny and smooth! Also I love the smell so much! Only thing is the packaging, I can’t tell how much is left in there because the bottle is so opaque.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didn't find this product to do much. Maybe I'd give it another shot. The smell wasn't anything crazy good to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best heat protective products I own. It has a nice light fragrance. It left my hair feeling so soft and lightweight. A little goes a long way even with how thick my hair is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: it smells AMAZING. even if it didn’t work (it does) i’d still buy it just to smell it all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! It smells great and makes my hair soft and silky while protecting it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: didn't notice a difference when using this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The only heat protectant I will use!!! Smells good and actually makes a difference when using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Light and smells heavenly. My hairdresser uses this on me and my hair looks glossy and light after she styles it. At home- I’m not sure, not looking as smooth. But, I’ve only used it three times so far. I have curly hair with balayage and only use a diffuser as heat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A product that I continually repurchase. I use this just after towel-drying my hair (so it's fairly damp/wet), and spray it throughout, though prioritizing the ends, just before hairdrying. Locks in moisture and leaves my hair with a subtle shine without any grease.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Helps my hair, smells delicious, and keeps my hair soft throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So amazing! I have thick long hair that gets oily very easy so I’m careful of what I put on it. I originally bought this in a sample size in a sample set of bumble and bumble, and ended up buying the full thing and bought my mom a bottle! As a busy college student this has done wonders for my hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: B&B Invisible Oil Heat & UV Primer seems okay for wet hair, but it's terrible on my hair when it's dry. In fact, it makes the tangles *worse*. My hair is tangly and stringy until I shampoo it next (~ every 3 days). My hair stylist always used it on me, but I think the salon used B&B products even if those products were trash. My hair always looks great after the salon, but I think that's due to the skill of the stylist, the blow-dryer, et cetera (NOT this product).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favourite primer. Sprays on lightweight and helps with detangling before applying any other haircare products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far my favorite heat protectant. It doesn't leave my hair greasy and smells AMAZING! Worth the price all the way.

reviews.review_title: Do NOT use if you have FINE or THIN hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product definitely does not work for fine or thin hair.  The worker at Sephora said it would be ok - but it's not.  It made my hair very stringy and rough.  I feel like it actually took away the moisture and it tangled so easily.  I tried it several times over the past 2 months and each time it did it.  Then I'd switch to other products - and boom! shine was back and softness was back.  This may work for thick or medium hair - but if you have thin, fine, long hair - do not use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like this product weighs my hair down, and leaves a film on my hair. If I try to use this with hot tools, it seems to melt on the tool somehow, and makes my hair stick to it. Maybe I'm not using it right based on the great reviews, but I did not think this product was worth it. Probably best for people just looking to blow out damp hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly was expecting more from this product... I thought my hair would be really soft and shiny, but it felt dry. And the smell is very overpowering

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Felt like putting nothing in my hair. Could have been water. Was really disappointed in this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love almost everything about this product (smell, consistency, ease of application, and of course the benefit of UV protection), except how the day after washing my hair there’s so much frizz from using this. Not sure if maybe I’m doing something wrong & I’ll definitely keep using but it’s definitely worth mentioning.

reviews.review_title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE- I have fine hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is absolutely amazing. They say not for thin hair but that’s false.   Fine hair?  Step 1. Spray the « Hairdresser’s Invisible Oil Heat & UV Protective Primer » All over your hair but concentrate more on your ends. (Not too much)  Step 2. Squeeze 1 pump of the « Hairdresser’s Invisible Oil » in your hands depending on the thickness of your hair. Rub your hands very good before dabbing your ends... Dab ends only!!!    I’m a blond with very fine hair. My hair is mid back length and I only use one pump.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: amazing! I use almost everyday, does not make my hair greasy like other heat protection products. knocks frizz right out an smells good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: amazing product!! i have bleached, damaged fine hair and i combine this product with the verb ghost oil and damp hair then blow dry and wow its like i have virgin hair all over again. Hair is shiny, soft, healthy and detangled. will buy again 100%

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: has a strong, really weird smell (kinda like a grandma's perfume?) and does nothing for frizz. I only use it in the summer so the sun doesn't burn my fine hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite protective spray! I have pretty damaged hair from styling and coloring but spraying this on before using heat styling tools made my hair so soft! Not to mention the smell is amazing. Will be purchasing again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells delicious, minimizes blow dry time, leaves my hair glossy and full. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use heat to style my hair pretty often since I don't like my natural waves and I have tried just about every highly recommended heat protectants, and this one is the best!! This one is amazing because it does not have alcohol denat like most protectants do, so it is not drying and is incredibly hydrating. I have been using it a couple of times week for about a year now and my hair has never been better. I recently got a haircut for the first time in about 7 months and my hair stylist was surprised at how great my split ends were considering I hadn't gotten a trim in so long and how much heat i use. It's a little pricey but is worth every penny. It also lasts me about 4-6 months with frequent use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this when I made another purchase, and I really liked it for my usual wash and go routine. It wasn't heavy, and it smells great.  For reference, I have thick, wavy, salt and pepper shoulder-length hair.  Usually, I get out of the shower, semi dry my hair with my microfiber towel, and spray it all over my hair.  When I use my Drybar Baby Brush, I follow the same steps, and brush my hair, leaving it sleek and smooth. It isn't stiff, greasy, or limp. I liked it so much, I bought the big bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m always quick to buy when I see 5 star reviews and everyone going “OMG IT SAVED MY LIFE”.  yes, this product is pretty great. But I haven’t seen a huge change in my hair. It’s not magic as the rest of the reviews make you think lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an okay product. I’m not sure if they changed the formulation? I had this years ago as a sample and it left my hair nice and shiny. Now I spray it and it leaves my hair heavy and like a thick film on it (not necessarily greasy but the hair feels almost goopy when you touch it). I’m a little surprised so I think I’ll be tossing this one out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product over the last month and a half after every shower. I started by spit-zing my bottom half a few times. When my hair dried it still seemed wet like it wasn't dry, I realized it was oily from the spray. So I started spraying it in my hands and scrunching it into my hair from the ends and it still left greasy patches. I have been reducing the amount to 3 sprays into my hand and just applying it only to my ends and it is still greasy. I wouldn't call this invisible by an means. Maybe it is just my hair type but it doesn't work for me. I have blonde treated curly hair with dry ends so I thought it would work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing. The smell is light but enough to leave your hair smelling so good. I found my blonde dry hair to be less frizzy after using. Love that its a heat protectant as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because my hair is so frizzy, but it did not help that at all, which was a bummer. However, it did help my hair feel so much softer and it's helps to detangle as well. It was originally making my hair more oily but spraying it my hand first instead of directly on my hair really helped that.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for coarse and really dry hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the mini version, because of the bad reviews from people saying that it made their hair oily. However, I have really coarse thick hair, which is really prone to being dry. I have now used this a few times, and I really like it. It has a mixture of few oils, which might not suit people that do not have really dry hair. In my case, it makes my hair feel soft and smooth. Also, I really like the smell. I even use it with Moroccan oil afterwards for my ends, with no oiliness issues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my hair so soft and smell amazing. After I’d been using this for a couple months I did notice my hair had way less damage from blow drying etc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has been a holy grail since I bleached my hair. This is my favorite product for helping tame my frizz! It makes my hair feel so soft and smooth, and I’ve noticed a little goes a long way. I do have medium to thin hair, so that may be why I need less, but man do I love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! I used this in combination with the Morrocan oil and my hair felt amazing g while blow drying it and still feels great 2 days after blow drying my hair. In fact my hair feels like hair that’s never been dyed. Purchased the travel size bottle, will be purchasing the larger bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best primer I have ever used.  No flyaways, smooth finish, smells great, and leaves my hair feeling light and soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best hair product ever! It makes your hair silky and so beautiful without making it heavy and greasy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This made my hair so soft and shiny after I used a flat iron. I even used it in my 3 year old’s baby fine hair and it made the curls extra bouncy. The scent is very nice too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is really good one. Very light. Makes hair smooth. Not oily or sticky..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite primer I have found. It protects and deranged and the ingredients are not too bad. Totally but it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: “Directions: Spray on damp or dry hair, comb through...” yeah, no. After applying on damp hair, my hair got so clumpy, sticky, and tangled that I couldn’t even comb through at all. Save your money if your hair is actually frizzy, dry, or brittle (ironic, it’s supposed to help fix that!). Does not work!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised! I have fine, wavy hair and always avoided leave-in products in the past as they usually left my hair feeling weighed down/crunchy/greasy. This did none of those things, and my hair feels soft to the touch after using with less frizz. The smell is nice but not overpowering. I've also used this as a detangling spray and allowed my hair to air dry, and my hair still ended up soft! I will probably re-purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know what caused my webbing, but from what I remember, when I used this product, it made my curl clumps big and soft. I need to purchase on my next restock of hair products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I still have not found the perfect leave-in conditioner, but this product works well. I will probably purchase again. It can be a little heavy if I apply too much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best word to describe this product: fresh. Does exactly what it says. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Product smells great, light spray and has definitely helped to protect my hair from heat damage. Both from styling heat and sun exposure. Will continue using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this stuff is horrible, it does absolutely nothing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this product! Smells HEAVENLY and i put it on my hair when it’s wet or damp. Noticeably smoother and less frizzy after a blow dry or even just an air dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: literally the best thing for my curly hair. obsessed. have gone through about 15 bottles of this.

reviews.review_title: Limited UV protection, But worth the Smells
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little disappointed with this product.  The UV protection doesn’t really hold up on long car or bus rides when your hair is exposed to the sun through a window or plexi glass.  However, it is great if your using double heat or triple heat to process your hair like me with a blow dryer, metal round brush and a flat iron. It also smells amazing and helps my hair feel super soft.  I plan on trying to purchase the whole system of the Invisible Oil Heat and UV line to see if it solves the UV problem.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my hair soft and smooth and it smells amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes about this since bumble and bumble makes great products but this was not one of them. I have wavy hair and I wanted to love this but it does nothing for my hair. It looks the same with it without it and I haven’t seen any difference as far as protecting my hair heat. I’ve used cheaper ones that did way more for me than this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product does nothing for my hair. It’s insane how advertised and glorified it is but for coarse, dry, wavy hair (its target audience) it really doesn’t do a whole lot! And it’s wayyy to pricey for this! 2 stars because they do give you a lot of this hair perfume (because that’s all it’s good for)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells so good. Makes my hair soooo amazing. Repurchasing and getting the bigger one this time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use it before blow drying with a round brush. Makes my hair super soft and smooth. Best styling product I’ve ever used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This primer can be described as lightweight, feathery and usable for hair before styling it straight, or wavy in a ponytail as a I personally prefer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a staple. Super versatile product. It’s an awesome heat protectant, detangler, and defrizzer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a staple product in my daily hair care routine. Spritzing a light amount before blow dry protects hair from heat damage, does not weigh hair down, and does not cause excess buildup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this as a leave in conditioner for the last 2 years now. Absolutely love it! It helps tame frizz and makes my bleached hair shiny and soft!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love Bumble and Bumble products... but not wowed by this product. It’s a very light in application. In order to really notice its effects, I found myself using a lot. If you prefer a spray, definitely give it a try. Glad a tried it, but won’t be purchasing it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Had it for a day and I can already tell this stuff is amazing! Smells great very light smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have thick, wavy hair that gets easily tangled. I do like the way this product left my hair. It did detangle and left my hair smooth and wavy. I didn’t like the  cheap vanilla scent which was a deal breaker for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great moisture without the weight of the oil. The spray does not weigh your hair down as much as the invisible oil does. Smells great and comes in a big bottle that lasts a decently long time. Worth the price to protect your hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Did not help my dry hair detangle. I tried this product for almost a year and then gave up. It doesn't help smooth my hair or work for me as a  prr blow dry primer. it s even worse when used on dry hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff smells amazing, doesn’t weight down my fine hair, actually protects from heat AND offers UV protection. It’s just an all-around amazing product and it lasts such a long time. It’s not heavy at all but leaves my hair feeling moisturized and protected. I’ve used this for years and will never use anything else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! I am not usually one to wear product everyday because I have think hair that gets weighed down easily. This will NOT weight your hair down but will make it so, so soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried SO many hair products looking for a good, simple primer for my hair and THIS IS THE BEST! I spray it on my hair while its wet and then comb it through and then either- leave it and go to bed or - blowdry it and style. It doesn't even feel like i've put anything in my hair, it's amazing. Will and have repurchased

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine hair prone to oiliness (I’m really not who this product is intended for) BUT! This is a godsend on the days I don’t wash my hair. I find that spraying directly on my hair makes it difficult to distribute evenly so I spray it on my hands and finger comb instead. It may not be the intended use, but it is effective and I will certainly be purchasing again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really upset with this product since there were so many great reviews. I have super dry hair that gets super tangled especially after washing my hair. I get it’s a “oil” but this made my hair insanely greasy. When I don’t use this my hair won’t get greasy till the 3rd day without washing this, but using this after my nighttime shower, I wake up with greasy looking hair already. I’ve even tried applying it just to my ends, however it still gets greasy after i just brush my hair. Super upsetting. Only good part is the heat protection

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. I am going through an intense lighting process so I don’t have to “deal” with my grey hair as much. My consents are aging, of course, as well as damage and brittleness. This product is super light weight, moisturizing, and super lightweight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry, thick, coarse hair. I used this mainly as a heat protectant for flat ironing my hair. It holds up pretty well for intense heat (up to 450°). It also does pretty well as a leave-in conditioner. It makes my hair soft and tame my flyaways, but it doesn't leave a shine. It also doesn't protect against humidity if your hair tend to be a victim of humidity like mine. I'm also not particularly fond of the smell. It's a little perfumish for my liking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I guess I didn’t have luck with this product. I bought the big size with high hopes it would help at least improve the dry, lackluster appearance of my bleached hair, but I didn’t see any major difference. For the price point, I was just expecting something magical. I’ll go back to my $6 drugstore hair product. I’m super bummed :/

reviews.review_title: All time favorite after shower product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have noticed a big difference in my hair using this, my hair is much shiner and healthier and I love it. I have super thick hair too and my hair can get knotty easily and this has solved the knotting issues in my hair. My hair combs through softly the next morning. I also use if it I am straightening my hair and when I didn't before my hair would be a hot mess after 1 hour. I recommend this to anyone especially to anyone with thick hair like me. Go buy it!! It's worth it

reviews.review_title: Not as good as original oil
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I much prefer the original hairdresser's invisible oil... oil. That stuff lasts forever, I feel like I have to use so much of this product because it's a spray and so much is just lost in the atmosphere. It smells wonderful, though, as does the whole line, and does make my hair softer and more manageable. I'm glad I got a smaller size before committing. I won't be buying again, but rather just sticking to the original oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves my blonde, processed hair feeling softer than normal. Helps control my frizz too! I use this along with my Moroccan Oil. They are both staples of mine and they work well together in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First time using this product I felt it’s some sort of magic potion. My hair was silky soft to touch. However after continued use I guess my hair developed some sort of resistance maybe.. cause it stopped feeling so smooth. But that’s just my dry hair. The product is great

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am seriously loving this oil spray. It leaves my hair feeling so soft and smooth. I was never one to really take care of my hair. However, I am slowly starting to be more cautious about it, I stumbled upon this as a sample for frizzy hair and I swear it has made a huge difference. My hair feels a lot healthier and fuller - without being too heavy. It minimizes the frizz and makes it look so shiny. I highly recommend. I bought the full size and I'm still very happy and worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found this product to be very okay. It didn't really help smooth my fine, straight, frizzy hair, and if I got it too close to my roots it would definitely make it way too oily.  I think it definitely works for heat protection, but all the moisturizing benefits advertised did not work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I literally love this so much, it smells SO GOOD. And it’s also amazing, it doesn’t make my hair look greasy yet it gives me that shine and silky look I’m looking for. And not to mention it still smells amazing even after straightening/curling your hair. It’s so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Did not do any thing special to my colored, frizzy and damaged hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have thin, fine, frizzy dry color damaged hair, scalp gets oily fast, this helps the ends of my hair but i feel like this is not good for people who have oily scalp, you’re gonna need to use dry shampoo a lot more, hair feels softer and is less frizzy but it didn’t help prevent damage much

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First time buying this product; so far hair feels soft and smells good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great scent, very nourishing, and makes my hair look shiny and healthy even when heat styling. I like that it’s also UV protective.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Does is it do miracles? I mean not really. But it does make a difference and let me tell you, it’s hard for any product to make a difference in my hair. I have thick coarse frizzy hair. I have baby hairs always coming in but my hair is so thick and fluffy hardly anything ever works. But this does. It makes my hair more manageable and it preps it for my straightener or my curling wand. I will definitely be buying this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This smells amaaaaazing. I am not sure if it protects my hair the way it said it's supposed to [it's quarantine so my hair is a hot mess]. My hair is super duper coarse and wirey, and I only wash my hair around once a week, but I use this most days in between to keep things smooth and smelling fresh. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for years & I still love it.  Makes combing wet hair super easy - no tangles. Plus I like that it has heat protection. Smells good too. Not over powering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It leaves my hair shiny and has a subtle nice smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this on a whim since my hair has been so dry. This stuff is the BEST!  I've used it on both damp and dry hair. Keeps my hair really straight without having to use a flat iron and adds a ton of shine. Great purchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the scent, it is light and doesn't make my hair sticky like some products.  It seems to make my hair a little softer, but not sure I can tell a huge difference?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with the scent !! It’s not too strong (I’m sensitive to fragrance) and but it’s a light enough scent that you can’t smell all day. I love how soft it makes my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not only do I love the scent of it, but this hair primer/heat protectant does great things for you hair. I like to curl my hair and straighten it sometimes, and it helps your hair not get frizzy, as well as keeping it healthy. My hair is no longer damaged by heat! Love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This did not work for my hair. I have thick/dry hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really really really really love this product. I have naturally wavy, poofy hair, so I always gotta style my hair when it dries. My hair is damaged, dry, sort of thin and breaks easily and not that soft. This product makes me hair SILKY smooth. I sometimes use too much and it feels a bit flat but it will be insanely soft and with my curler my hair feels even silkier. I don't see my damaged ends breaking off anymore and it's easier to brush too. This product will never leave my hair care routine now. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very thick hair that was previously dyed blond, so it’s somewhat damaged. This left my hair feeling encased in buildup and still dry.  Unfortunately, can’t recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bumble and bumble products have often just not worked with my hair (3a/b curl). However, bought a mini sample of this when I bought my Blow bar Double Shot and this is a pretty amazing product. I notice a CONSIDERABLE difference when blowing out my hair rather than just using a leave-in conditioner after my shower and creme before styling (I use Briogeo detangler and Malin&Geotz Sage creme). Humidity DESTROYS any attempt at a straight blowout for me because my hair is so curly, but with this product, though my hair will never stay straight for too long, I get these beautiful, defined soft waves and curls without the frizz that humidity gives. My hair looks so good, I'll likely blowout more (meaning more need for the product! Clever!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If there is only one hair product I get to use for the rest of my life, it would be this! I absolutely adore this product. I spray it whenever I need to - before blow drying straight, before leaving it to air dry for curly hair days, after styling it. It smells lovely, protects my hair, eases the frizz and makes my hair soft - yes, it does it all in my books. And best part is that it doesn't leave my hair sticky or weigh it down. Definitely a MVP in my books!

reviews.review_title: A must for healthy looking hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves hair noticeably softer, tames frizz, and makes styling a breeze.  Will definitely be purchasing again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it so much. I recently got my hair permed. It helps to reduce frizziness and add moisture. After washing my hair, I use it as a leave-in conditioner. Also, every morning, it's very easy to spray on my dry hair as UV protection and reduce the frizziness again after sleep which I really love about it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: the best heat protectant I’ve tried
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I swear by this heat protectant. I have strawberry blonde hair with very fine and very thick strands, and get my hair cut maybe 1-2 times a year. Last time I went in my hairdresser was amazed that my hair was in such good shape (little to no split ends— I used to have so many!). I’ve been using this for 3-4 years now and won’t use anything else. B&B has created a staple product everyone should have, IMO.   I’ve tried many different kinds of heat protectant and this is by far the best. Smells great, lasts for a long time, and does it’s job.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this in the healthy hair promo and fell in love after once use. I have such thick coarse frizzy hair and this tamed, made it shine, and smoothed it out right after I got after the shower and applied too my campy hair. Will be purchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine long curly hair. So basically I’m a unicorn because almost all curly hair leave in/ moisturizers are made for THICK curly hair that needs oils and moisture like an Irish man needs beer on St. Paddy’s Day. Keep it coming status. If I use stuff like that on my hair it looks greasy and weighed down, instantly, even if I use just a small amount of product. So I need a detangler/leave in/ heat protectant (yes I diffuse and straighten when I feel like, so sue me). I. Tried. It. All. I could not find one product to do everything I needed until I happened to see this recommended quite a few times on different forums for leave in hair products. First of all, I know it’s expensive. But second of all, and more importantly IT’S WORTH IT. My wet combs goes through my hair so well with just three sprays on each half head of hair (I’m lazy and literally just section right down the middle and call it a day). Great detangler. As for leave in conditioner it makes my hair so soft!!!! WITHOUT WEIGHING IT DOWN WHATSOEVER. Which anyone with fine hair will tell you is sooooo important. Great leave in conditioner. And when I use heat my hair stays very soft and manageable and after using this product for a couple months my hair doesn’t seem to be suffering from heat damage like it normally did before using this product. Great heat protectant. This also is a great base because as a curly girl I layer products like no ones business! So. Bottom line. If you’re in the market for a leave in, or a detangler, or a heat protectant, look no further and give this baby a try. Plus it smells amazing! Win win win win!

reviews.review_title: Fancy hair care does the job to 85% satisfaction
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have long curly hair (type 2C) and I use this oil on my damp hair and dry upside down with a diffuser while scrunching. I've been trying to use products that make my curls look nice without using gel, mousse or hairspray. This stuff does the job, but is not the best I've used. I like that it's small and good for travel. It smells great, seemingly morphing little by little with each use. Overall it makes me think of the beach (coconut) and viva la juicy perfume. I think it adds a little volume/texture but leaves my hair a little less sleek and doesn't define my curls as much as this other product:Totex 2 Phase Argan Oil Conditioning spray. I bought the Totex from a salon which was $21 for 13oz (big bottle!). The B&B product is $13 for 2oz. While it was nice to try and I will continue to periodically use it until I finish the bottle, it is a no-brainer for me to stick to my Totex spray.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this primer. It really protects my hair when I’m styling it with heat. It works whether my hair is damp or dry. I use it most when my hair is dry and I’m about to straighten it. I have wavy to curly hair so I have to run the straightener a couple times. I can tell it helps and protects my hair from the damage done by the heat. The primer has a nice spray and a nice fragrance. The fragrance isn’t too strong but I personally don’t mind fragrances in my products so it doesn’t bug me. This is a good sized hair product for the price. The plus is it lasts a long time. I don’t think I can express how much I love this Bumble and Bumble primer.

My hair feels so soft, looks shiny and healthy, and helps tames frizz and fly-aways (as a girl with lots of stray hairs, so helpful). But since I have fine hair, I cant use this product everyday for a long period of time as it becomes weighted down and lifeless-looking. So I usually switch over to my drugstore heat protector for a little while and then go back. I found this routine works well for my hair. I love the mini size to travel with and, when it runs out, I just top it up with the bigger bottle. I will definitely continue buying this product!

reviews.review_text: I had highlights (perhaps poorly done highlights) for 5 years. As a result my hair got so dry it became matted. It took several hours to comb. This is the product I used to reverse the damage, and even now with healthy hair I still use it after every wash to keep up hydrated, healthy hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This made my hair so soft after just one use! I used to work at Sephora and customers would always rave about this product but, as a person who doesn’t usually like hair oil, I never felt inclined to try it. Because I spend a lot of time in the sunshine in the summer, I was looking for something to protect my hair from UV and (again) saw raving reviews about this product so I decided to check it out. It made my hair so soft after just using it once! It’s definitely “invisible”, I used it in combination with Olaplex No. 6 (which sometimes makes my hair a little greasy looking) and there was still no residue left on my hair. It smells great and I think I’m going to move to this from Olaplex No. 6 since this offers heat and UV protection! Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has a great smell and does tame my frizz really nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first time I tried this, I wasn't a fan. I thought it left my hair too greasy and heavy. I recently colored my hair, which has now left it dry and brittle. So I decided to give this another shot and holy goodness, it's been amazing! My hair is so sleek and shiny! I will definitely be making sure I always have a bottle of this. I never style my hair without this now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It tames my frizz and my dry hair soaked it all up without feeling greasy! I am so glad I bought this product.   I squirt the product into my hands before incorporating it in my hair.   I think the price is very fair too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

It also helps to detangle after washing and keeps my hair feeling soft. I use it even when I’m just air drying. I like knowing that my strands are protected when I use heat and while out in the sun. It has a nice smell that isn’t too overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent everyday use primer.   I’ve used it for years and have never even considered changing products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A must for my long, fine straight hair. I rarely blow dry, but this is an excellent detangler. Hair is left soft and not so heavy, as some people have mentioned heavier, not for me. Only beef is although B&B is cruelty free, they are owned by Estée Lauder, which is not. I am at odds with that.

reviews.review_text: This is an excellent heat protectant and overall styler. The inclusion of a UV protectant is particularly noteworthy. This was a little heavy for my fine hair if i sprayed it directly on my hair, so I rub some in my palms and rake it through. Smells wonderful, keeps frizz at bay, makes hair suuuuper soft, and lasts a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample and love it so much I've ordered a full size one. Helps with my frizz, protects my hair from further damage, and smells amazing. Also, doesn't weight down my fine hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair
reviews.review_text: Protects my hair so well from heat damage and keeps frizziness away too! Love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great and makes my hair look better while keeping it healthier!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't typically like B&B products but this one changed my mind. I use a lot of hot tools on my hair and get back split ends, and this made a huge difference. My hair looks healthier and feels great but it doesn't weight it down or look oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This Primer not only smells like heaven but makes my hair so silky and soft. I have recently gone from box die to having had bleached my hair. My hair was breaking and it was so hard to brush out after washing it. I am pretty generous with the amount of product I use from mid length to the ends..I have found it can make me have an oily scalp if I spray to close to the top. This primer makes it so easy to brush tangled hair and is a great heat protectant!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a bit hesitant to buy this, based on some reviews.  But  started with just 3 sprays into my damp hair before blow drying.  It did look a little oily by the end of the day, so I switched to 2 sprays into my palms, then running it through the ends of my hair.  That worked perfectly, and my hair looked super smooth after I dried it.  Just using 2 pumps keeps from hair from looking greasy, and the bottle will definitely last longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product saved my hair!! Years ago I had major chemical damage, and this was the only thing light enough and moisturizing enough to help tame the frizz and help my ends from further snapping off. Now that the colour treated part of my hair has grown out and been cut off, all of my hair is happy and healthy and growing so much faster than ever before. I have very fine hair and live in a dry climate, so the ends can get crispy even without chemical or heat damage. Whenever I’m not using this product consistently, I can tell the difference! I spray my damp hair with it after I shower and follow with Moroccan oil. I use this on my dry hair before brushing, in between shampooing, and before heat styling. It’s a great versatile product with a neutral scent that will make your hair very happy with consistent use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
