reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product so much! I had jet black hair and have went through multiple processes to become blonde and this is the only thing that made my hair soft and easy to comb. I spray this into my hair when it's damp before blow drying and my hair looks amazing. I can spray a very good amount and my hair will not feel sticky AT ALL.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: smells really good, doesn't weigh down my hair or make it greasy, and makes my bleached dry hair styleable and manageable. i also have naturally dry hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have frizzy hair, this product did not help with adding shine/ taming the frizz.

reviews.review_title: Good product, better if your hair isn't fine.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My experience with this product has been good. I'm not quite sure how well it works as a primer since it's my first primer experience, but the hydrating aspect is a good draw in itself; I concentrate it on my damaged ends for extra moisture and it keeps them soft. It's also quite light-weight, and I can use it throughout if I do so sparingly. Only thing is, I have **exceptionally fine hair,** and it does feel a bit tacky if it's sprayed too much. The Sephora staff member who sold it to me knew that it was worth the hype, but didn't seem to understand that it's intended for medium to thick hair. Overally, I had enough of a positive experience with this to try a different Bb primer specifically for thin hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this along with the invisible oil to boost the moisture in my hair and it also smells amazing! Doesn’t leave the hair greasy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine, color processed hair that I style A LOT. This stuff is a lifesaver!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is probably one of the only hair products you even need to achieve a great blowout. i’ve used moroccan oil serum and heat protectants but nothing compares to this. spray it in your hair while damp (i use purple conditioner as well and recommend every blonde to do the same) brush out and blow dry. i achieved the best looking longest lasting blowout from this product. i bought it in on a whim and i’m very pleased.
It smells very good and it is great for thick hair that uses heat. It controls frizz and makes my hair soft and shiny which is a necessity for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have medium wavy/curly hair and sometimes it can get a bit frizzy and dry after I shower. I used the spray for the first time and I instantly felt and saw a difference in my hair! My hair is shiny, looks and feels healthy after blow drying and straightening! I am very happy with this product. It leaves my hair smelling very pleasant too which is a plus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Left my hair VERY dry, brittle, and frizzy, especially at the bottom. Never experienced that before from a hair product. Not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really don't get all the hype about this product. I was actually so excited to purchase it and have just been super disappointed. It left my hair sticky, knotty, dry and frizzy.

reviews.review_title: Best so far for my hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my number one for now. It really deatangles my hair, and leaves them super soft and with a loooot less frizz. Only small downside, is be carefull if you have oliy scalp to not put near your scalp.....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lightweight enough for my fine hair (pure coconut oil is too much for my hair), makes my hair soft, and smells really good! I hate really heavy hair salon-y scents but this is a lightly sweet smell (may smell stronger if you use more but I only need a little in my hair).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I just received this and I love it. I have fine, color treated hair therefore I have to avoid washing my hair too often. I end up with very dry ends and I find that a lot of hair primers make my ends oily and, after brushing, the oil transfers to the rest of my hair and it looks greasy (e.g., Kevin Murphy “Young.Again”). This product is a game changer! It doesn’t leave your hair oily, effectively detangles after showering, even fine hair like mine. My ends look hydrated and fresh and healthy.   It smells very strong and sweet, so I took off a star for that. I associate really strong smelling products with cheap stuff that’s marketed to teenagers. It smells a little too sexy for work so I try to use it sparingly so I’m not leaving a trail of perfume.

reviews.review_title: Smells good and reduces poofyness for thick hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product because I was looking for something that made my second day (or third or fourth day) hair smell good while also allowing me to brush it and tame some of the frizz and poofy-ness. For reference I have very thick, long, wavy hair- it is borderline curly but it’s so heavy that it’s more of a wave. I used this on my dry hair after I brushed it and hadn’t washed it for a couple days, it made my hair smell great for longer than just a couple hours and it also tamed the poofyness. I would definitely recommend this for people who don’t want to wash their hair everyday but still need to brush it to tame it, buuuut at the same time have wavy/curly hair (if you know, you know- #wavyhairproblems). I’m giving four stars because I did notice a slight residue on my hair the next day that made it feel a bit heavy, nothing that would stop me from using the product but I think worth noting for people who don’t want that. It could probably be avoided by using less product. But overall would recommend!

reviews.review_title: DO NOT RECOMMEND FOR NORMAL HAIR
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: DO NOT GET THIS PRODUCT IF YOUR HAIR IS NORMAL. I used to have very dry, processed hair. As it has grown out, the healthy hair has not reacted well to this product. If you like the feeling of heavy products in your hair, you may like this. Whenever I used this before a blowdry, my hair felt dirtier than before I washed it. I highly do not recommend this product if you have normal, or non-dry hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this spray. Goes on light and does not weight your hair down as it dries. I have wavy/curly hair and wanted something to help keep frizz at bay. Spritzed this in my hair before going outside by the pool, my hair was definitely softer and more manageable than it usually is after I’ve been in the sun after washing and conditioning. Bought the small size after reading some mixed reviews, will definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My hairs very thin and dry and it helps protect my colour and makes your hair soooo soft!

reviews.review_title: Love it, but need a lot of product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this as a de tangler and leave in. It is light weight and doesn’t weigh my hair down. I apply to damp hair after showering. However, I do feel I use a lot (10 or so spritzes) to really see and feel the effects of the spray after drying. I have long not thin nor thick straight hair which is not particularly dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this primer for.. 3 years? It's an absolute MUST for my hair. I've received so many compliments on how healthy my hair looks when using it, which is insane because I use a lot of heat on my hair.  I think this has saved my hair from a lot of damage and it was originally recommended to me by my hair stylist.  It smells sooo good, applies easily, and I've never had a problem with the spray nozzle getting all gunked up and broken like some hair products do.  Love it and highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love how it detangles my knotty hair. It also makes it smooth and shiny. I have fine hair but it doesn't weigh it down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this product, smells great, and leaves hair looking soft and healthy. My only warning is that if you have fine hair (like I do) add a little at a time because like most people with fine hair, its really easy to over do it!

reviews.review_title: So perfect for my thin hair!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much! It smells absolutely amazing and isn’t super heavy on my hair. I have long, dark, stick straight, thin hair that gets oily a day after washing. I’m currently training my hair to only wash it 3-4 times a week. I listed some tips below for those who have hair like mine and want the best results with this product:  1. I do not use this on days that I wash my hair and let it air dry unless my hair is knotted 2. If I wash my hair and blow-dry it, I will blow dry my hair a little, then pull my hair to the side and spray once on the ends only. I’ll comb the product through with my fingers and use the excess on my fingers throughout the rest of my hair. I let it work it’s magic for about 5 minutes and then continue to blow dry 3. On days that I don’t wash my hair and my ends look dry, I will spray once from about 3/4 down my hair to the ends of my hair 4. I absolutely LOVE this as a heat protectant before I curl my hair. I will spray it on my ends, detangle with my fingers, and use the product on my fingers in the rest of my hair. Let it sit for about 5 minutes and then curl my hair  Hope this helps!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was purchased mainly as a heat styling protectant, no complaints there. My hair is curly, fine, and thin for reference. Therefore, I do experience a lot of frizz. This does tame it slightly, but more notably, the effect is long lasting. Also, it does detangle hair. However, I’ve used better detanglers. I wouldn’t say it adds much shine. The scent- lovely, but not overpowering! I don’t like hair products competing with my perfume. Worth a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It didn’t really do anything, a waste of money in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What the others say is true! It does EVERYTHING! I use it mainly to add a textured volume look to my shag haircut and put it into my hair after showering... and it does an awesome job! I got a sample and I'm obsessed with it. Definitely will keep using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tiene un rico aroma. Solo pensé que el producto era un más grande de lo que es.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easily the best all-round product I've purchased from Sephora! It makes brushing through my hair with ZERO tangles and keeps it smooth and soft. I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was suggested this by my hairdresser when I stopped being a silly teen and dying my hair at home and frying it. My hairdresser suggested this to help combat more damage as my hair was breaking off. After 5 years I still use this stuff because it allows you to genuinely protect from further damage. It will not fix already damaged hair (nothing will) but it helps prevent it getting worse. I also love how it helps to detangle and reduce frizz. I wish it was cheaper but it's worth the price.

reviews.review_title: Best money I've ever spent on haircare
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried soooo many hair products. This leave in is the holy grail. My hair is so light and soft afterwards and completely transformed. If I find my hair is getting dry in between washes i use it to refresh the ends with a little bit of water and a couple pumps into your palms. Bumble and bumble you nailed it.

reviews.review_title: MUST USE this NOW!!  Awesome hair primer!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product!  I had purchased the travel size to use as a primer and it worked fine.  I ran out of my Bumble and bumble Primer and decided to pull this one out!  So amazing!  My hair is super soft, less frizzy and since I'm staying at home, I don't even need any additional product!  I bought the bigger size and it's a staple of my haircare routine!  I won't give this one up!!  I have shoulder length, fine hair and it works fabulously!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally does everything- softens, smoothes, adds volume, shine, detangles, protects... what else is there to say really. Holy Grail. I’ll never buy another hair primer/detangler again. FYI, I have fine but thick wavy hair that tends to be tangled, frizzy, and lose volume. Buy it, it works.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing! Everything in one bottle, detangling, anti- frizz, uv protection, heat protectant, smooths... is really a nice product! My hair is oily and this just goes so well without adding more oil in to my  hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It's my new go to after washing my hair, it keeps it so soft and looks in much better condition since using it. I have quite fine hair so only need to use a little but it makes such a difference. I spray it on my hair after washing when it's still damp, and comb it through before heat styling. Great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product, I use it every time I wash my hair. It keeps my hair soft and shiny when I blow dry it or use heat to style it and it helps to keep the frizz away if I let it air dry. I must be on my 5th or 6th bottle now. I just keep repurchasing it when I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have thin, fine, wavy bleached hair and this product has been a lifesaver!! It makes my hair super soft, it doesn’t weigh it down like other products and it smells amazing! It eliminates frizz like magic, it definitely lives up to the hype.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this as my go-to detangling solution post-shower for years. My hairdresser introduced me to it. I feel it’s also protected my hair well against heat styling, my hairdresser always says it’s very healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for over a month and love this product. My hair is so much healthier and I now air dry after washing and I’ve noticed a difference in volume and also the softness of my hair. I apply heat to my hair at least 4 days a week and my hair is healthy! Also it is such a great size! Sooo much product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, I bought this because it makes my hair smell SO GOOD. It’s just an added benefit that it also protects! I like that it doesn’t weigh my hair down like other protectants!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never even used to use conditioner, b/c it weighed my hair down.  Although I did try hair volumizing products, they worked for maybe an hour.  With summer coming up, I thought I’d get something to protect the color from the sun, so I tried this.  I was definitely amazed when this OIL added lasting volume and easy manageability to my hair.  I would’ve never guessed it would do this.  I could finally wear my hair down all day knowing it looked great, and my friends/family noticed the difference too.  Give it a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine blonde hair, but a lot of it, and it has pretty much always looked dried out. I have tried so many different products and I absolutely love this product. It smells great and it doesn't weigh down my hair like a shine oil. I will spray a little on my ends when my hair is damp and that keeps it looking hydrated throughout the day. I will even use it on my dry hair if my hair ends up looking dry the next day. I don't think I can live without this product now that I've tried it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This oil primer is super good! Makes my hair soft and healthy: after blow dry I’m amazed how nice my hair look like. It does not make my hair oily or greasy like other products and smells amazing. Glad I bought it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loooooove this stuff. I don’t even know what kind of magic is in it, but it makes my hair amazing before I do anything to it.

Smells great, gives your hair the ability to be shaped/formed while blow drying. I wouldn’t spray the roots as much since I do feel my hair will get greasier faster than usual. Hair does feel a little smoother and not as frizzy. The only reason why it’s missing the last star on my rating is because this spray kills the volume of my hair a bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love when products smell like I’ve been to the hair salon. This spray is super lightweight and smells fantastic and I’ve noticed my ends stay a lot smoother if I apply this before I dry my hair. Plus, you can never go wrong with bumble & bumble packaging. So cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My very favorite product from Bumble & Bumble. It helps detangle and silken my long, fine hair after washing. I also love using it when I’m by the pool or at the beach for protection from the sun and ease of detangling later.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this when after I shower or before I plan on using heating tools on my hair. It doesn't make my hair oily, and I haven't noticed that my hair is heat damaged since I started using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m in love with this invisible oil primer. It smells lovely and the scent isn’t overpowering. I use it after every wash and on my dry hair before I style it or if I’m going outside. It has zero weight or appearance to it, invisible. It sprays really nicely. I have zero complaints about this product. I will repurchase for sure.

reviews.review_title: Great Primer for Detangling and Heat Protection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to detangler and heat protector. A little goes a long way and it almost immediately detangles my fine, long hair. It goes on light and I also really like the mild scent.

reviews.review_title: great! but not a miracle worker
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff, it makes my hair nice and soft. The only reason I give it four stars instead of five is because my hair recently got super dry (unrelated) and this guy can only do so much. It’s not a miracle by any stretch. It smells great though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Outstanding heat protection and frizz control. BB never disappoints.

reviews.review_title: Best leave in styling product ever
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many different styling products, from leave in masks to sprays to hair oils and everything in between. Nothing has worked better than this, honestly. The product has a nice smell and doesn't weigh down my thin, oily hair. I use it right before I blow dry and straighten my hair, and my hair ends up smooth, soft, and it retains its style/shape for much longer, even if it's windy. I keep trying other products, but I keep coming back to this one, especially since it seems like it lasts a long while (I have a small bottle that after a dozen uses, if not more, is still almost completely full).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried plenty of leave-ins and this is by far the best. I have very fine hair that gets greasy so easily. This stuff is so light and doesn’t weigh down my hair at all. It smells amazing, lasts about 3 months (I use it once a day on long hair), and is very moisturizing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product and will become a staple in my beauty routine. I have thick frizzy hair and I spray this right before I blow dry it. My hair remains frizz free and shiny for days, highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is awesome product! It is lightweight and has an amazing smell! I have been using it for last two years. The bottle (250 ml) last forever

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very fine, thin, naturally curly, bleached blonde hair so I was worried this product would make my hair greasy but it does NOT! I use about 5-6 pumps on damp hair then blow dry and style. 2 years ago I had about 6 inches of my hair break off due to over treating it but after I started using this, banana briogeo shampoo & conditioner and the olaplex leave in conditioner my hair has grown back and feels healthier than ever. I recommend this product to everyone!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Its good but you have to be careful if you use too much your hair can become quite greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this item when it was on sale just to give it a try. I read many reviews and saw that most were positive.   I have very sensitive skin and very thin hair that can easily get oily and greasy from a product if it is too heavy or has some ingredients that does not work with my hair.   I have been using this product for 6 months now and have gone through about half the bottle. It does exactly what it promises and works well with my thin hair. Using this along with some supplements my hair dresser noted that my hair looks and feels thicker and healthier. I use this primer after every wash and before drying and styling my hair.  The only reason i did not give it 5 stars is because it tends to make my hair a little frizzier when using it compared to the its a 10 keratin spray.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews, but this is the best leave-in hair product I have ever tried. I have wavy-curly combination hair (mainly loose waves) that poofs easily if not defined, and this primer makes my hair softer and much more manageable for several days in-between washes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely cannot live without this. It's great for detangling and it helps protect from heat. It smells great and is definitely worth getting!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not my jam. It’s like it’s trying to be a leave in conditioner and an oil at the same time and I’m not about that. I have thick hair, tons of tiny strands and it’s wavy just in the back of my head. This just  weighs it down. Nice smell though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i love this primer, my hair is greying and much drier than when I was young.  This tames frizz a bit and yet my natural curls still shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product! I found myself coming back to it always...added plus - it smells wonderful! I have fine hair that I dye blonde so it’s important for me to use something like this to protect my hair as much as possible. I like that it protects from UV as well considering I live in Florida. My hair smells good, feels better, has more shine, and brushes out much easier after spraying this on! The product does its job!! I have used miracle 10 as well for a cheaper option, but this one is worth the splurge in my opinion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this. I spray it in my hair almost everyday even if I am not putting heat in my hair it helps with frizz and overall helps the appearance of your hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: OMG this saved my hair!! I have thin curly hair and live in super humid Florida. I've tried so many products and this is the only one that got rid of all of my frizz! Definitely my new holy grail

reviews.review_title: Great option for coarse, dry hair!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This leave in treatment has been a game changer when it comes to caring for my dry, coarse hair. I’ve swapped it for regular conditioner at the end of my showers and the ends of my hair feel much more nourished and aren’t so dry and frizzy. 10/10 would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing at detangling my long hair after a shower. I also really like to use a few sprays in the morning near the ends before I brush my hair. My boyfriend also really likes the smell and is always complimenting me on it! I deducted one star because it's not clean and I wish it was.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used to use the dry bar prep spray, but then switched to this primer from bumble and bumble. So happy I did! Love the smell, love how it detangles and primes my hair before I put heat on it.  The product is great to use even when I just want to let my hair air dry. Makes it softer and less frizzy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was worried it would make my hair oily but it did not! It’s my new favorite heat protectant and it smells great too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not only does this product smell amazing, I saw noticeable results after my first use! I don't like using heat tools on my hair too often because of the damage it causes, but after using this primer/protectant, my hair was soft and smooth. The frizziness I normally get after blow drying was almost completely eliminated and my hair stayed soft and silky for days after. The one downside is the price, however it's a large bottle and it does deliver the results I wanted.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing and leaves hair soft. Just used it 3 times so not sure if its protecting my hair but I hope so.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried FOREVER to find a heat protectant spray that doesn’t weigh down my hair or make it feel gross. This one is amazing! It doesn’t leave any buildup and actually makes my hair softer and silkier. I blow dry my hair almost every day and this has really saved it from getting dried out and damaged - would 100% recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE!! Make my hair so shiny and soft. The smell is also amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love! Will never go back to another heat protectant

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It was a very effective product at first, made my hair really soft, kept it moisturized and protected it from heat to an extent. After about three months however, my hair seemed to get used to it and it does not keep it as soft as it used to. I believe for the price there may be better products out there.

reviews.review_title: Used it for a YEAR. Here's my review...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've had this product for about a year and I figured I'd give an honest review. I have fair long red-dyed damaged dry hair. I use this product 3 times a week, after washing, and it's lasted me a year. I use about ten sprays per use.   It's not a miracle worker, but it does the job well enough that if nothing else worked better I'd go back to this product. It definitely can feel a little heavy sometimes and make my hair oily faster, but it does well to protect the hair (IMO) before a blowdry. Though I do wish it worked better on dry hair before styling. I've never used any BB products, and I know this one is all the rage (Lol) but I don't see it as a perfect solution, rather, good paired with other products and used lightly. Overall I like it, and I'm not super impressed, but I'd recommend it for anyone needing a little help with their ends as it helped protect my ends from further damage paired with other oils!   Hope this helped. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know why this product get so much love. It's okay, but not a amazing. It's expensive and doesn't last very long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely write reviews but WOW! This product is a life saver for anyone who uses heat on their hair. My hair is pretty healthy but my ends do feel dry and damaged every once and a while. It made my hair sooo smooth, soft and it smells amazing. It’s like it instantly hydrated the ends of my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell WOW! makes my hair super soft and smooth, protects it against heat damage, just have to be careful of the amount you put on, if you put too much it will make your hair greasy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use this primer every single time I dry my hair. I’ve noticed such a difference in the softness and the frizziness of my hair if I don’t use the primer. It makes my hair easy to comb and provides a great base for me to apply any oils or leave-in conditioners. Even when I use it by itself, it makes a huge difference in keeping my hair frizz-free and silky-soft.

reviews.review_title: My Alltime Favorite Line from Bumble & Bumble
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is the best! The whole invisible oil line is just my fave. Its uber lightweight, easy to spritz on and smells like heaven! Not too fragranced and pairs well with the invisible oil hair serum and dry oil. Those three products and my hair actually bounces for like three days! Will definitely buy again!

reviews.review_title: A dream for hair that loves to be blow dried
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's light, it's effective, I use it all over my damp hair (not soaking wet), it makes blow drying a dream - my hair isn't dry, its soft and protected.  Careful not to shake it, you don't need to, just flip the bottle once and you are good.  I never run out of this product, I have yet to find anything that replaces it.  I do like to layer up though - this product, followed by R+Co Park Ave Blow Ave Blow Out Balm or Kerastase Blow Dry Reshapable Heat Lotion.  It's the perfect primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE!!! I have very dry hair and I've honestly tried everything so I was a little discouraged at the beginning. After just one time of using this my hair looks amazing!!!! I'm honestly shocked this actually works :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 111000% the best primer there is. It is a detangling, priming, heat-protecting masterpiece! It smooths and shines like no other, I highly recommend it for people looking for healthy hair. For reference, my hair is long and naturally wavy/curly--think lots of frizz!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: IN LOVE!!! This has made my hair super soft after showers and helps restore the hydration in my hair. Make sure not to use too much otherwise will feel oily, I have thin hair so  I don't add too much. I love how it has heat & UV protection, super helpful!!! I 10000% recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. Works great on wet and dry hair  and doesn’t feel too heavy since I have thin hair. I can use it alone or I can layer it with other products. What ever you do to your hair this product can handle it.  Too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing ! I use it every time I wash my hair . Even if not heat styling . Leaves my hair silky soft and manageable . I have purchased for 2nd time .  The smell is nice too !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent product!! I absolutely cannot practise good haircare standards without this primer. I use heat to curl my hair and this offers great protection. It moisturizes while creating nice bounce. I buy this over and over again. I works for both natural and synthetic hair.

reviews.review_title: At Least Try The Mini Size

reviews.review_text: This is a great heat protector! Keeps my thin hair soft, smooth and hydrated from blow dryers/ straighteners

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have thin hair and get fly-aways, especially in the winter in Colorado where the air is very dry.  A few sprays of this product tames the fly-aways and leaves my hair silky without weighing it down.  I do have to take breaks from it once in a while, but usually only for a couple of washes/blow-out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I naturally just have very dry hair, so this helps a lot. Makes it feel soft and actually nourished. Doesn’t build up or make hair feel greasy at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have pretty thick, untame wavy, dyed platinum, textured longggg hair and I have about 0% skill in styling my hair, but I use a round brush with a blow dryer built in and spray this onto my hair beforehand and it makes a big difference in the outcome. This will keep the style longer, silkier, straighter, and on the positive side it's also protecting my long dyed hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great and works good on keeping my hair moist when I'm about to use heat on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product. My hair is frizzy and between wavy and curly. When straightening my hair I tried lots and lots of products nothing seem to work but this makes my hair look amazing. Soft. Shiny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Love this new addition to my hair routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! It smells amazing and I've noticed a difference in the appearance of my hair when using it versus without. My hair looks healthier and stronger. I am going through it quickly, but I have pretty long and thick hair so that's to be expected. I'll keep repurchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this spray and have been using it for about 4 months now. The bottle spritzes easily. The formula is light that it doesn't weigh down my thin hair, but it still covers it and protects my hair from the blow dryer. I took a star off because you need at least 4-5 spritzes for medium length hair that is shampooed every other day - basically the product dwindles quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product makes my hair so smooth and silky! It is easy to comb through and leaves you with a really beautiful blow out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long long way! Smells amazing and the scent lingers in a good way.
